Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: These will be the heirs,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Who will inherit Paradise: they will dwell therein (for ever).
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Man We did create from a quintessence (of clay);
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then We placed him as (a drop of) sperm in a place of rest, firmly fixed;
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then We made the sperm into a clot of congealed blood; then of that clot We made a (foetus) lump; then we made out of that lump bones and clothed the bones with flesh; then we developed out of it another creature. So blessed be Allah, the best to create!
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: After that, at length ye will die
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Again, on the Day of Judgment, will ye be raised up.
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And We have made, above you, seven tracts; and We are never unmindful of (our) Creation.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And We send down water from the sky according to (due) measure, and We cause it to soak in the soil; and We certainly are able to drain it off (with ease).
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: With it We grow for you gardens of date-palms and vines: in them have ye abundant fruits: and of them ye eat (and have enjoyment),-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Also a tree springing out of Mount Sinai, which produces oil, and relish for those who use it for food.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And in cattle (too) ye have an instructive example: from within their bodies We produce (milk) for you to drink; there are, in them, (besides), numerous (other) benefits for you; and of their (meat) ye eat;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And on them, as well as in ships, ye ride.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (Further, We sent a long line of prophets for your instruction). We sent Noah to his people: He said, "O my people! worship Allah! Ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: The chiefs of the Unbelievers among his people said: "He is no more than a man like yourselves: his wish is to assert his superiority over you: if Allah had wished (to send messengers), He could have sent down angels; never did we hear such a thing (as he says), among our ancestors of old."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: (And some said): "He is only a man possessed: wait (and have patience) with him for a time."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (Noah) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: So We inspired him (with this message): "Construct the Ark within Our sight and under Our guidance: then when comes Our Command, and the fountains of the earth gush forth, take thou on board pairs of every species, male and female, and thy family- except those of them against whom the Word has already gone forth: And address Me not in favour of the wrong-doers; for they shall be drowned (in the Flood).
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: And when thou hast embarked on the Ark - thou and those with thee,- say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has saved us from the people who do wrong."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: And say: "O my Lord! enable me to disembark with thy blessing: for Thou art the Best to enable (us) to disembark."
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Verily in this there are Signs (for men to understand); (thus) do We try (men).
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: And We sent to them a messenger from among themselves, (saying), "Worship Allah! ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And the chiefs of his people, who disbelieved and denied the Meeting in the Hereafter, and on whom We had bestowed the good things of this life, said: "He is no more than a man like yourselves: he eats of that of which ye eat, and drinks of what ye drink.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "If ye obey a man like yourselves, behold, it is certain ye will be lost.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Does he promise that when ye die and become dust and bones, ye shall be brought forth (again)?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Far, very far is that which ye are promised!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "There is nothing but our life in this world! We shall die and we live! But we shall never be raised up again!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "He is only a man who invents a lie against Allah, but we are not the ones to believe in him!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (The prophet) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: (Allah) said: "In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Then the Blast overtook them with justice, and We made them as rubbish of dead leaves (floating on the stream of Time)! So away with the people who do wrong!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: No people can hasten their term, nor can they delay (it).
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then sent We our messengers in succession: every time there came to a people their messenger, they accused him of falsehood: so We made them follow each other (in punishment): We made them as a tale (that is told): So away with a people that will not believe!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron, with Our Signs and authority manifest,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: To Pharaoh and his Chiefs: But these behaved insolently: they were an arrogant people.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: They said: "Shall we believe in two men like ourselves? And their people are subject to us!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So they accused them of falsehood, and they became of those who were destroyed.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might receive guidance.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And We made the son of Mary and his mother as a Sign: We gave them both shelter on high ground, affording rest and security and furnished with springs.
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: O ye messengers! enjoy (all) things good and pure, and work righteousness: for I am well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Until, when We seize in Punishment those of them who received the good things of this world, behold, they will groan in supplication!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (It will be said): "Groan not in supplication this day: for ye shall certainly not be helped by Us.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "My Signs used to be rehearsed to you, but ye used to turn back on your heels-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Do they not ponder over the Word (of Allah), or has anything (new) come to them that did not come to their fathers of old?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Or do they say, "He is possessed"? Nay, he has brought them the Truth, but most of them hate the Truth.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Or is it that thou askest them for some recompense? But the recompense of thy Lord is best: He is the Best of those who give sustenance.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And verily those who believe not in the Hereafter are deviating from that Way.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: It is He Who has created for you (the faculties of) hearing, sight, feeling and understanding: little thanks it is ye give!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: And He has multiplied you through the earth, and to Him shall ye be gathered back.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: It is He Who gives life and death, and to Him (is due) the alternation of Night and Day: will ye not then understand?
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: On the contrary they say things similar to what the ancients said.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They say: "What! when we die and become dust and bones, could we really be raised up again?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Such things have been promised to us and to our fathers before! they are nothing but tales of the ancients!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: "To whom belong the earth and all beings therein? (say) if ye know!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: They will say, "To Allah!" say: "Yet will ye not receive admonition?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Say: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and the Lord of the Throne (of Glory) Supreme?"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They will say, "(They belong) to Allah." Say: "Will ye not then be filled with awe?"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: "Who is it in whose hands is the governance of all things,- who protects (all), but is not protected (of any)? (say) if ye know."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They will say, "(It belongs) to Allah." Say: "Then how are ye deluded?"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: No son did Allah beget, nor is there any god along with Him: (if there were many gods), behold, each god would have taken away what he had created, and some would have lorded it over others! Glory to Allah! (He is free) from the (sort of) things they attribute to Him!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Then, O my Lord! put me not amongst the people who do wrong!"
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: And say "O my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee from the suggestions of the Evil Ones.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "And I seek refuge with Thee O my Lord! lest they should come near me."
Label: ['syariah']

Text: (In Falsehood will they be) Until, when death comes to one of them, he says: "O my Lord! send me back (to life),-
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then when the Trumpet is blown, there will be no more relationships between them that Day, nor will one ask after another!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Then those whose balance (of good deeds) is heavy,- they will attain salvation:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But those whose balance is light, will be those who have lost their souls, in Hell will they abide.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The Fire will burn their faces, and they will therein grin, with their lips displaced.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "A part of My servants there was, who used to pray 'our Lord! we believe; then do Thou forgive us, and have mercy upon us: For Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!"
Label: ['syariah']

Text: He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?"
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: They will say: "We stayed a day or part of a day: but ask those who keep account."
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Therefore exalted be Allah, the King, the Reality: there is no god but He, the Lord of the Throne of Honour!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: So say: "O my Lord! grant Thou forgiveness and mercy for Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!"
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: A sura which We have sent down and which We have ordained in it have We sent down Clear Signs, in order that ye may receive admonition.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The woman and the man guilty of adultery or fornication,- flog each of them with a hundred stripes: Let not compassion move you in their case, in a matter prescribed by Allah, if ye believe in Allah and the Last Day: and let a party of the Believers witness their punishment.
Label: ['syariah', 'ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Let no man guilty of adultery or fornication marry and but a woman similarly guilty, or an Unbeliever: nor let any but such a man or an Unbeliever marry such a woman: to the Believers such a thing is forbidden.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And those who launch a charge against chaste women, and produce not four witnesses (to support their allegations),- flog them with eighty stripes; and reject their evidence ever after: for such men are wicked transgressors;-
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Unless they repent thereafter and mend (their conduct); for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: And for those who launch a charge against their spouses, and have (in support) no evidence but their own,- their solitary evidence (can be received) if they bear witness four times (with an oath) by Allah that they are solemnly telling the truth;
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And the fifth (oath) (should be) that they solemnly invoke the curse of Allah on themselves if they tell a lie.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: But it would avert the punishment from the wife, if she bears witness four times (with an oath) By Allah, that (her husband) is telling a lie;
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: And the fifth (oath) should be that she solemnly invokes the wrath of Allah on herself if (her accuser) is telling the truth.
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: If it were not for Allah's grace and mercy on you, and that Allah is Oft-Returning, full of Wisdom,- (Ye would be ruined indeed).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Those who brought forward the lie are a body among yourselves: think it not to be an evil to you; On the contrary it is good for you: to every man among them (will come the punishment) of the sin that he earned, and to him who took on himself the lead among them, will be a penalty grievous.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Why did not the believers - men and women - when ye heard of the affair,- put the best construction on it in their own minds and say, "This (charge) is an obvious lie"?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Why did they not bring four witnesses to prove it? When they have not brought the witnesses, such men, in the sight of Allah, (stand forth) themselves as liars!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Were it not for the grace and mercy of Allah on you, in this world and the Hereafter, a grievous penalty would have seized you in that ye rushed glibly into this affair.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, ye received it on your tongues, and said out of your mouths things of which ye had no knowledge; and ye thought it to be a light matter, while it was most serious in the sight of Allah.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And why did ye not, when ye heard it, say? - "It is not right of us to speak of this: Glory to Allah! this is a most serious slander!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Allah doth admonish you, that ye may never repeat such (conduct), if ye are (true) Believers.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And Allah makes the Signs plain to you: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Those who love (to see) scandal published broadcast among the Believers, will have a grievous Penalty in this life and in the Hereafter: Allah knows, and ye know not.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: O ye who believe! follow not Satan's footsteps: if any will follow the footsteps of Satan, he will (but) command what is shameful and wrong: and were it not for the grace and mercy of Allah on you, not one of you would ever have been pure: but Allah doth purify whom He pleases: and Allah is One Who hears and knows (all things).
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Let not those among you who are endued with grace and amplitude of means resolve by oath against helping their kinsmen, those in want, and those who have left their homes in Allah's cause: let them forgive and overlook, do you not wish that Allah should forgive you? For Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Those who slander chaste women, indiscreet but believing, are cursed in this life and in the Hereafter: for them is a grievous Penalty,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: On the Day when their tongues, their hands, and their feet will bear witness against them as to their actions.
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: On that Day Allah will pay them back (all) their just dues, and they will realise that Allah is the (very) Truth, that makes all things manifest.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Women impure are for men impure, and men impure for women impure and women of purity are for men of purity, and men of purity are for women of purity: these are not affected by what people say: for them there is forgiveness, and a provision honourable.
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: O ye who believe! enter not houses other than your own, until ye have asked permission and saluted those in them: that is best for you, in order that ye may heed (what is seemly).
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: If ye find no one in the house, enter not until permission is given to you: if ye are asked to go back, go back: that makes for greater purity for yourselves: and Allah knows well all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: It is no fault on your part to enter houses not used for living in, which serve some (other) use for you: And Allah has knowledge of what ye reveal and what ye conceal.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Say to the believing men that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty: that will make for greater purity for them: And Allah is well acquainted with all that they do.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And say to the believing women that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty; that they should not display their beauty and ornaments except what (must ordinarily) appear thereof; that they should draw their veils over their bosoms and not display their beauty except to their husbands, their fathers, their husband's fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or the slaves whom their right hands possess, or male servants free of physical needs, or small children who have no sense of the shame of sex; and that they should not strike their feet in order to draw attention to their hidden ornaments. And O ye Believers! turn ye all together towards Allah, that ye may attain Bliss.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Marry those among you who are single, or the virtuous ones among yourselves, male or female: if they are in poverty, Allah will give them means out of His grace: for Allah encompasseth all, and he knoweth all things.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Let those who find not the wherewithal for marriage keep themselves chaste, until Allah gives them means out of His grace. And if any of your slaves ask for a deed in writing (to enable them to earn their freedom for a certain sum), give them such a deed if ye know any good in them: yea, give them something yourselves out of the means which Allah has given to you. But force not your maids to prostitution when they desire chastity, in order that ye may make a gain in the goods of this life. But if anyone compels them, yet, after such compulsion, is Allah, Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful (to them),
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: We have already sent down to you verses making things clear, an illustration from (the story of) people who passed away before you, and an admonition for those who fear (Allah).
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The Parable of His Light is as if there were a Niche and within it a Lamp: the Lamp enclosed in Glass: the glass as it were a brilliant star: Lit from a blessed Tree, an Olive, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil is well-nigh luminous, though fire scarce touched it: Light upon Light! Allah doth guide whom He will to His Light: Allah doth set forth Parables for men: and Allah doth know all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: By men whom neither traffic nor merchandise can divert from the Remembrance of Allah, nor from regular Prayer, nor from the practice of regular Charity: Their (only) fear is for the Day when hearts and eyes will be transformed (in a world wholly new),-
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: That Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and add even more for them out of His Grace: for Allah doth provide for those whom He will, without measure.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: But the Unbelievers,- their deeds are like a mirage in sandy deserts, which the man parched with thirst mistakes for water; until when he comes up to it, he finds it to be nothing: But he finds Allah (ever) with him, and Allah will pay him his account: and Allah is swift in taking account.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Or (the Unbelievers' state) is like the depths of darkness in a vast deep ocean, overwhelmed with billow topped by billow, topped by (dark) clouds: depths of darkness, one above another: if a man stretches out his hands, he can hardly see it! for any to whom Allah giveth not light, there is no light!
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Seest thou not that it is Allah Whose praises all beings in the heavens and on earth do celebrate, and the birds (of the air) with wings outspread? Each one knows its own (mode of) prayer and praise. And Allah knows well all that they do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Yea, to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; and to Allah is the final goal (of all).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah makes the clouds move gently, then joins them together, then makes them into a heap? - then wilt thou see rain issue forth from their midst. And He sends down from the sky mountain masses (of clouds) wherein is hail: He strikes therewith whom He pleases and He turns it away from whom He pleases, the vivid flash of His lightning well-nigh blinds the sight.
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And Allah has created every animal from water: of them there are some that creep on their bellies; some that walk on two legs; and some that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills for verily Allah has power over all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: We have indeed sent down signs that make things manifest: and Allah guides whom He wills to a way that is straight.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah that, if only thou wouldst command them, they would leave (their homes). Say: "Swear ye not; Obedience is (more) reasonable; verily, Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: "Obey Allah, and obey the Messenger: but if ye turn away, he is only responsible for the duty placed on him and ye for that placed on you. If ye obey him, ye shall be on right guidance. The Messenger's duty is only to preach the clear (Message).
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: Allah has promised, to those among you who believe and work righteous deeds, that He will, of a surety, grant them in the land, inheritance (of power), as He granted it to those before them; that He will establish in authority their religion - the one which He has chosen for them; and that He will change (their state), after the fear in which they (lived), to one of security and peace: 'They will worship Me (alone) and not associate aught with Me. 'If any do reject Faith after this, they are rebellious and wicked.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: So establish regular Prayer and give regular Charity; and obey the Messenger; that ye may receive mercy.
Label: ['syariah', 'ilmu']

Text: Never think thou that the Unbelievers are going to frustrate (Allah's Plan) on earth: their abode is the Fire,- and it is indeed an evil refuge!
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: O ye who believe! let those whom your right hands possess, and the (children) among you who have not come of age ask your permission (before they come to your presence), on three occasions: before morning prayer; the while ye doff your clothes for the noonday heat; and after the late-night prayer: these are your three times of undress: outside those times it is not wrong for you or for them to move about attending to each other: Thus does Allah make clear the Signs to you: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: But when the children among you come of age, let them (also) ask for permission, as do those senior to them (in age): Thus does Allah make clear His Signs to you: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Such elderly women as are past the prospect of marriage,- there is no blame on them if they lay aside their (outer) garments, provided they make not a wanton display of their beauty: but it is best for them to be modest: and Allah is One Who sees and knows all things.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: It is no fault in the blind nor in one born lame, nor in one afflicted with illness, nor in yourselves, that ye should eat in your own houses, or those of your fathers, or your mothers, or your brothers, or your sisters, or your father's brothers or your father's sisters, or your mother's brothers, or your mother's sisters, or in houses of which the keys are in your possession, or in the house of a sincere friend of yours: there is no blame on you, whether ye eat in company or separately. But if ye enter houses, salute each other - a greeting of blessing and purity as from Allah. Thus does Allah make clear the signs to you: that ye may understand.
Label: ['syariah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Only those are believers, who believe in Allah and His Messenger: when they are with him on a matter requiring collective action, they do not depart until they have asked for his leave; those who ask for thy leave are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger; so when they ask for thy leave, for some business of theirs, give leave to those of them whom thou wilt, and ask Allah for their forgiveness: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Be quite sure that to Allah doth belong whatever is in the heavens and on earth. Well doth He know what ye are intent upon: and one day they will be brought back to Him, and He will tell them the truth of what they did: for Allah doth know all things.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Blessed is He who sent down the criterion to His servant, that it may be an admonition to all creatures;-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: no son has He begotten, nor has He a partner in His dominion: it is He who created all things, and ordered them in due proportions.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Yet have they taken, besides him, gods that can create nothing but are themselves created; that have no control of hurt or good to themselves; nor can they control death nor life nor resurrection.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But the misbelievers say: "Naught is this but a lie which he has forged, and others have helped him at it." In truth it is they who have put forward an iniquity and a falsehood.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And they say: "Tales of the ancients, which he has caused to be written: and they are dictated before him morning and evening."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: Say: "The (Qur'an) was sent down by Him who knows the mystery (that is) in the heavens and the earth: verily He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful."
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And they say: "What sort of a messenger is this, who eats food, and walks through the streets? Why has not an angel been sent down to him to give admonition with him?
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: "Or (Why) has not a treasure been bestowed on him, or why has he (not) a garden for enjoyment?" The wicked say: "Ye follow none other than a man bewitched."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Blessed is He who, if that were His will, could give thee better (things) than those,- Gardens beneath which rivers flow; and He could give thee palaces (secure to dwell in).
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Nay they deny the hour (of the judgment to come): but We have prepared a blazing fire for such as deny the hour:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: When it sees them from a place far off, they will hear its fury and its ranging sigh.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And when they are cast, bound together into a constricted place therein, they will plead for destruction there and then!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "This day plead not for a single destruction: plead for destruction oft-repeated!"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Say: "Is that best, or the eternal garden, promised to the righteous? for them, that is a reward as well as a goal (of attainment).
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: "For them there will be therein all that they wish for: they will dwell (there) for aye: A promise to be prayed for from thy Lord."
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And the messengers whom We sent before thee were all (men) who ate food and walked through the streets: We have made some of you as a trial for others: will ye have patience? for Allah is One Who sees (all things).
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Such as fear not the meeting with Us (for Judgment) say: "Why are not the angels sent down to us, or (why) do we not see our Lord?" Indeed they have an arrogant conceit of themselves, and mighty is the insolence of their impiety!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: The Day they see the angels,- no joy will there be to the sinners that Day: The (angels) will say: "There is a barrier forbidden (to you) altogether!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: The Day the heaven shall be rent asunder with clouds, and angels shall be sent down, descending (in ranks),-
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: That Day, the dominion as of right and truth, shall be (wholly) for (Allah) Most Merciful: it will be a Day of dire difficulty for the misbelievers.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "He did lead me astray from the Message (of Allah) after it had come to me! Ah! the Evil One is but a traitor to man!"
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Thus have We made for every prophet an enemy among the sinners: but enough is thy Lord to guide and to help.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Those who reject Faith say: "Why is not the Qur'an revealed to him all at once? Thus (is it revealed), that We may strengthen thy heart thereby, and We have rehearsed it to thee in slow, well-arranged stages, gradually.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Those who will be gathered to Hell (prone) on their faces,- they will be in an evil plight, and, as to Path, most astray.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (Before this,) We sent Moses The Book, and appointed his brother Aaron with him as minister;
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And the people of Noah,- when they rejected the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them as a Sign for mankind; and We have prepared for (all) wrong-doers a grievous Penalty;-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Seest thou such a one as taketh for his god his own passion (or impulse)? Couldst thou be a disposer of affairs for him?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Or thinkest thou that most of them listen or understand? They are only like cattle;- nay, they are worse astray in Path.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Hast thou not turned thy vision to thy Lord?- How He doth prolong the shadow! If He willed, He could make it stationary! then do We make the sun its guide;
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: And He it is Who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings, going before His mercy, and We send down pure water from the sky,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: That with it We may give life to a dead land, and slake the thirst of things We have created,- cattle and men in great numbers.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And We have distributed the (water) amongst them, in order that they may celebrate (our) praises, but most men are averse (to aught) but (rank) ingratitude.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Therefore listen not to the Unbelievers, but strive against them with the utmost strenuousness, with the (Qur'an).
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: It is He Who has let free the two bodies of flowing water: One palatable and sweet, and the other salt and bitter; yet has He made a barrier between them, a partition that is forbidden to be passed.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: It is He Who has created man from water: then has He established relationships of lineage and marriage: for thy Lord has power (over all things).
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: But thee We only sent to give glad tidings and admonition.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for it but this: that each one who will may take a (straight) Path to his Lord."
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: And put thy trust in Him Who lives and dies not; and celebrate his praise; and enough is He to be acquainted with the faults of His servants;-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He Who created the heavens and the earth and all that is between, in six days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): Allah Most Gracious: ask thou, then, about Him of any acquainted (with such things).
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: When it is said to them, "Prostrate to (Allah) Most Gracious!", they say, "And what is (Allah) Most Gracious? Shall we prostrate to that which thou commandest us?" And it increases their flight (from the Truth).
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: Blessed is He Who made constellations in the skies, and placed therein a Lamp and a Moon giving light;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the servants of (Allah) Most Gracious are those who walk on the earth in humility, and when the ignorant address them, they say, "Peace!";
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Those who say, "Our Lord! avert from us the Wrath of Hell, for its Wrath is indeed an affliction grievous,-
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Those who invoke not, with Allah, any other god, nor slay such life as Allah has made sacred except for just cause, nor commit fornication; - and any that does this (not only) meets punishment.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: (But) the Penalty on the Day of Judgment will be doubled to him, and he will dwell therein in ignominy,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Unless he repents, believes, and works righteous deeds, for Allah will change the evil of such persons into good, and Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful,
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And whoever repents and does good has truly turned to Allah with an (acceptable) conversion;-
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: And those who pray, "Our Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous."
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: Those are the ones who will be rewarded with the highest place in heaven, because of their patient constancy: therein shall they be met with salutations and peace,
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Dwelling therein;- how beautiful an abode and place of rest!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Ta. Sin. Mim.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: If (such) were Our Will, We could send down to them from the sky a Sign, to which they would bend their necks in humility.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: But there comes not to them a newly-revealed Message from (Allah) Most Gracious, but they turn away therefrom.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They have indeed rejected (the Message): so they will know soon (enough) the truth of what they mocked at!
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Do they not look at the earth,- how many noble things of all kinds We have produced therein?
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Verily, in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And verily, thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Behold, thy Lord called Moses: "Go to the people of iniquity,-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "The people of the Pharaoh: will they not fear Allah?"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! I do fear that they will charge me with falsehood:
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: "My breast will be straitened. And my speech may not go (smoothly): so send unto Aaron.
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: "And (further), they have a charge of crime against me; and I fear they may slay me."
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Allah said: "By no means! proceed then, both of you, with Our Signs; We are with you, and will listen (to your call).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "So go forth, both of you, to Pharaoh, and say: 'We have been sent by the Lord and Cherisher of the worlds;
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "'Send thou with us the Children of Israel.'"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Pharaoh) said: "Did we not cherish thee as a child among us, and didst thou not stay in our midst many years of thy life?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And thou didst a deed of thine which (thou knowest) thou didst, and thou art an ungrateful (wretch)!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And this is the favour with which thou dost reproach me,- that thou hast enslaved the Children of Israel!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Pharaoh said: "And what is the 'Lord and Cherisher of the worlds'?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: (Moses) said: "The Lord and Cherisher of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- if ye want to be quite sure."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: (Pharaoh) said to those around: "Did ye not listen (to what he says)?"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Moses) said: "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers from the beginning!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Pharaoh) said: "Truly your messenger who has been sent to you is a veritable madman!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Moses) said: "Lord of the East and the West, and all between! if ye only had sense!"
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: (Pharaoh) said: "If thou dost put forward any god other than me, I will certainly put thee in prison!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Moses) said: "Even if I showed you something clear (and) convincing?"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Pharaoh) said: "Show it then, if thou tellest the truth!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So (Moses) threw his rod, and behold, it was a serpent, plain (for all to see)!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And he drew out his hand, and behold, it was white to all beholders!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: (Pharaoh) said to the Chiefs around him: "This is indeed a sorcerer well-versed:
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "His plan is to get you out of your land by his sorcery; then what is it ye counsel?"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: They said: "Keep him and his brother in suspense (for a while), and dispatch to the Cities heralds to collect-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And bring up to thee all (our) sorcerers well-versed."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So the sorcerers were got together for the appointment of a day well-known,
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And the people were told: "Are ye (now) assembled?-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "That we may follow the sorcerers (in religion) if they win?"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So when the sorcerers arrived, they said to Pharaoh: "Of course - shall we have a (suitable) reward if we win?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: He said: "Yea, (and more),- for ye shall in that case be (raised to posts) nearest (to my person)."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Moses said to them: "Throw ye - that which ye are about to throw!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So they threw their ropes and their rods, and said: "By the might of Pharaoh, it is we who will certainly win!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then Moses threw his rod, when, behold, it straightway swallows up all the falsehoods which they fake!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then did the sorcerers fall down, prostrate in adoration,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Said (Pharaoh): "Believe ye in Him before I give you permission? surely he is your leader, who has taught you sorcery! but soon shall ye know! Be sure I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will cause you all to die on the cross!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: They said: "No matter! for us, we shall but return to our Lord!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "Only, our desire is that our Lord will forgive us our faults, that we may become foremost among the believers!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: By inspiration we told Moses: "Travel by night with my servants; for surely ye shall be pursued."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to (all) the Cities,
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (Saying): "These (Israelites) are but a small band,
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And they are raging furiously against us;
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "But we are a multitude amply fore-warned."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So We expelled them from gardens, springs,
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Treasures, and every kind of honourable position;
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Thus it was, but We made the Children of Israel inheritors of such things.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So they pursued them at sunrise.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And when the two bodies saw each other, the people of Moses said: "We are sure to be overtaken."
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: (Moses) said: "By no means! my Lord is with me! Soon will He guide me!"
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then We told Moses by inspiration: "Strike the sea with thy rod." So it divided, and each separate part became like the huge, firm mass of a mountain.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And We made the other party approach thither.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: We delivered Moses and all who were with him;
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: But We drowned the others.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And rehearse to them (something of) Abraham's story.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Behold, he said to his father and his people: "What worship ye?"
Label: ['syariah']

Text: They said: "We worship idols, and we remain constantly in attendance on them."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: He said: "Do they listen to you when ye call (on them)?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: "Or do you good or harm?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: They said: "Nay, but we found our fathers doing thus (what we do)."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: He said: "Do ye then see whom ye have been worshipping,-
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu']

Text: "Ye and your fathers before you?-
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: "For they are enemies to me; not so the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds;
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: "Who created me, and it is He Who guides me;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Who gives me food and drink,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "And when I am ill, it is He Who cures me;
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: "Who will cause me to die, and then to life (again);
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "O my Lord! bestow wisdom on me, and join me with the righteous;
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "Make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss;
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: "Forgive my father, for that he is among those astray;
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "And let me not be in disgrace on the Day when (men) will be raised up;-
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "The Day whereon neither wealth nor sons will avail,
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "But only he (will prosper) that brings to Allah a sound heart;
Label: ['syariah']

Text: "To the righteous, the Garden will be brought near,
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: "And to those straying in Evil, the Fire will be placed in full view;
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "And it shall be said to them: 'Where are the (gods) ye worshipped-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "'Besides Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?'
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Then they will be thrown headlong into the (Fire),- they and those straying in Evil,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "And the whole hosts of Iblis together.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: "'By Allah, we were truly in an error manifest,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "'When we held you as equals with the Lord of the Worlds;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "'Now, then, we have none to intercede (for us),
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "'Nor a single friend to feel (for us).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Verily in this is a Sign but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The people of Noah rejected the messengers.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, their brother Noah said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust:
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "So fear Allah, and obey me.
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds:
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: "So fear Allah, and obey me."
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: They said: "Shall we believe in thee when it is the meanest that follow thee?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "And what do I know as to what they do?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Their account is only with my Lord, if ye could (but) understand.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "I am not one to drive away those who believe.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "I am sent only to warn plainly in public."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: They said: "If thou desist not, O Noah! thou shalt be stoned (to death)."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! truly my people have rejected me.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: "Judge Thou, then, between me and them openly, and deliver me and those of the Believers who are with me."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: So We delivered him and those with him, in the Ark filled (with all creatures).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Thereafter We drowned those who remained behind.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: The 'Ad (people) rejected the messengers.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, their brother Hud said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "So fear Allah and obey me.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: "Now fear Allah, and obey me.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "Yea, fear Him Who has bestowed on you freely all that ye know.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Freely has He bestowed on you cattle and sons,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "And Gardens and Springs.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Great Day."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They said: "It is the same to us whether thou admonish us or be not among (our) admonishers!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: So they rejected him, and We destroyed them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The Thamud (people) rejected the messengers.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, their brother Salih said to them: "Will you not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "So fear Allah, and obey me.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: "Will ye be left secure, in (the enjoyment of) all that ye have here?-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Gardens and Springs,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "And corn-fields and date-palms with spathes near breaking (with the weight of fruit)?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "And ye carve houses out of (rocky) mountains with great skill.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: "But fear Allah and obey me;
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "And follow not the bidding of those who are extravagant,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: "Who make mischief in the land, and mend not (their ways)."
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Thou art no more than a mortal like us: then bring us a Sign, if thou tellest the truth!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But the Penalty seized them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The people of Lut rejected the messengers.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, their brother Lut said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "So fear Allah and obey me.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: They said: "If thou desist not, O Lut! thou wilt assuredly be cast out!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "O my Lord! deliver me and my family from such things as they do!"
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Behold, Shu'aib said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "So fear Allah and obey me.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: "And withhold not things justly due to men, nor do evil in the land, working mischief.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Now cause a piece of the sky to fall on us, if thou art truthful!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Verily in that is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Verily this is a Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds:
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: With it came down the spirit of Faith and Truth-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Is it not a Sign to them that the Learned of the Children of Israel knew it (as true)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Yet there comes to them at length the (Punishment) which they were promised!
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: It will profit them not that they enjoyed (this life)!
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Never did We destroy a population, but had its warners -
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: So call not on any other god with Allah, or thou wilt be among those under the Penalty.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And admonish thy nearest kinsmen,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And put thy trust on the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: For it is He Who heareth and knoweth all things.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Seest thou not that they wander distracted in every valley?-
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: These are verses of the Qur'an,-a book that makes (things) clear;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: A guide: and glad tidings for the believers,-
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: Those who establish regular prayers and give in regular charity, and also have (full) assurance of the hereafter.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: As to thee, the Qur'an is bestowed upon thee from the presence of one who is wise and all-knowing.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Behold! Moses said to his family: "I perceive a fire; soon will I bring you from there some information, or I will bring you a burning brand to light our fuel, that ye may warm yourselves.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But when he came to the (fire), a voice was heard: "Blessed are those in the fire and those around: and glory to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "O Moses! verily, I am Allah, the exalted in might, the wise!....
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "Now do thou throw thy rod!" But when he saw it moving (of its own accord) as if it had been a snake, he turned back in retreat, and retraced not his steps: "O Moses!" (it was said), "Fear not: truly, in My presence, those called as messengers have no fear,-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "But if any have done wrong and have thereafter substituted good to take the place of evil, truly, I am Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: "Now put thy hand into thy bosom, and it will come forth white without stain (or harm): (these are) among the nine Signs (thou wilt take) to Pharaoh and his people: for they are a people rebellious in transgression."
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: But when Our Signs came to them, that should have opened their eyes, they said: "This is sorcery manifest!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And they rejected those Signs in iniquity and arrogance, though their souls were convinced thereof: so see what was the end of those who acted corruptly!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: We gave (in the past) knowledge to David and Solomon: And they both said: "Praise be to Allah, Who has favoured us above many of his servants who believe!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And Solomon was David's heir. He said: "O ye people! We have been taught the speech of birds, and on us has been bestowed (a little) of all things: this is indeed Grace manifest (from Allah.)"
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And before Solomon were marshalled his hosts,- of Jinns and men and birds, and they were all kept in order and ranks.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: At length, when they came to a (lowly) valley of ants, one of the ants said: "O ye ants, get into your habitations, lest Solomon and his hosts crush you (under foot) without knowing it."
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: So he smiled, amused at her speech; and he said: "O my Lord! so order me that I may be grateful for Thy favours, which thou hast bestowed on me and on my parents, and that I may work the righteousness that will please Thee: And admit me, by Thy Grace, to the ranks of Thy righteous Servants."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: And he took a muster of the Birds; and he said: "Why is it I see not the Hoopoe? Or is he among the absentees?
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "I will certainly punish him with a severe penalty, or execute him, unless he bring me a clear reason (for absence)."
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: But the Hoopoe tarried not far: he (came up and) said: "I have compassed (territory) which thou hast not compassed, and I have come to thee from Saba with tidings true.
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: "I found (there) a woman ruling over them and provided with every requisite; and she has a magnificent throne.
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: "I found her and her people worshipping the sun besides Allah: Satan has made their deeds seem pleasing in their eyes, and has kept them away from the Path,- so they receive no guidance,-
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: "(Kept them away from the Path), that they should not worship Allah, Who brings to light what is hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knows what ye hide and what ye reveal.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: "Allah!- there is no god but He!- Lord of the Throne Supreme!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: "Go thou, with this letter of mine, and deliver it to them: then draw back from them, and (wait to) see what answer they return"...
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: (The queen) said: "Ye chiefs! here is delivered to me - a letter worthy of respect.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "It is from Solomon, and is (as follows): 'In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful:
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "'Be ye not arrogant against me, but come to me in submission (to the true Religion).'"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: She said: "Ye chiefs! advise me in (this) my affair: no affair have I decided except in your presence."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: They said: "We are endued with strength, and given to vehement war: but the command is with thee; so consider what thou wilt command."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: She said: "Kings, when they enter a country, despoil it, and make the noblest of its people its meanest thus do they behave.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "But I am going to send him a present, and (wait) to see with what (answer) return (my) ambassadors."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Now when (the embassy) came to Solomon, he said: "Will ye give me abundance in wealth? But that which Allah has given me is better than that which He has given you! Nay it is ye who rejoice in your gift!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Go back to them, and be sure we shall come to them with such hosts as they will never be able to meet: We shall expel them from there in disgrace, and they will feel humbled (indeed)."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: He said (to his own men): "Ye chiefs! which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Said an 'Ifrit, of the Jinns: "I will bring it to thee before thou rise from thy council: indeed I have full strength for the purpose, and may be trusted."
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Said one who had knowledge of the Book: "I will bring it to thee within the twinkling of an eye!" Then when (Solomon) saw it placed firmly before him, he said: "This is by the Grace of my Lord!- to test me whether I am grateful or ungrateful! and if any is grateful, truly his gratitude is (a gain) for his own soul; but if any is ungrateful, truly my Lord is Free of all Needs, Supreme in Honour!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "Transform her throne out of all recognition by her: let us see whether she is guided (to the truth) or is one of those who receive no guidance."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So when she arrived, she was asked, "Is this thy throne?" She said, "It was just like this; and knowledge was bestowed on us in advance of this, and we have submitted to Allah (in Islam)."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And he diverted her from the worship of others besides Allah: for she was (sprung) of a people that had no faith.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: She was asked to enter the lofty Palace: but when she saw it, she thought it was a lake of water, and she (tucked up her skirts), uncovering her legs. He said: "This is but a palace paved smooth with slabs of glass." She said: "O my Lord! I have indeed wronged my soul: I do (now) submit (in Islam), with Solomon, to the Lord of the Worlds."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: We sent (aforetime), to the Thamud, their brother Salih, saying, "Serve Allah": But behold, they became two factions quarrelling with each other.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "O my people! why ask ye to hasten on the evil in preference to the good? If only ye ask Allah for forgiveness, ye may hope to receive mercy.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They said: "Ill omen do we augur from thee and those that are with thee". He said: "Your ill omen is with Allah; yea, ye are a people under trial."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: There were in the city nine men of a family, who made mischief in the land, and would not reform.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: They said: "Swear a mutual oath by Allah that we shall make a secret night attack on him and his people, and that we shall then say to his heir (when he seeks vengeance): 'We were not present at the slaughter of his people, and we are positively telling the truth.'"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Now such were their houses, - in utter ruin, - because they practised wrong-doing. Verily in this is a Sign for people of knowledge.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: (We also sent) Lut (as a messenger): behold, He said to his people, "Do ye do what is shameful though ye see (its iniquity)?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Would ye really approach men in your lusts rather than women? Nay, ye are a people (grossly) ignorant!
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: But his people gave no other answer but this: they said, "Drive out the followers of Lut from your city: these are indeed men who want to be clean and pure!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: But We saved him and his family, except his wife; her We destined to be of those who lagged behind.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And We rained down on them a shower (of brimstone): and evil was the shower on those who were admonished (but heeded not)!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: Praise be to Allah, and Peace on his servants whom He has chosen (for his Message). (Who) is better?- Allah or the false gods they associate (with Him)?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Or, Who has created the heavens and the earth, and Who sends you down rain from the sky? Yea, with it We cause to grow well-planted orchards full of beauty of delight: it is not in your power to cause the growth of the trees in them. (Can there be another) god besides Allah? Nay, they are a people who swerve from justice.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Or, Who has made the earth firm to live in; made rivers in its midst; set thereon mountains immovable; and made a separating bar between the two bodies of flowing water? (can there be another) god besides Allah? Nay, most of them know not.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Or, Who listens to the (soul) distressed when it calls on Him, and Who relieves its suffering, and makes you (mankind) inheritors of the earth? (Can there be another) god besides Allah? Little it is that ye heed!
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Or, Who guides you through the depths of darkness on land and sea, and Who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings, going before His Mercy? (Can there be another) god besides Allah?- High is Allah above what they associate with Him!
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Or, Who originates creation, then repeats it, and who gives you sustenance from heaven and earth? (Can there be another) god besides Allah? Say, "Bring forth your argument, if ye are telling the truth!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Say: None in the heavens or on earth, except Allah, knows what is hidden: nor can they perceive when they shall be raised up (for Judgment).
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Say: "Go ye through the earth and see what has been the end of those guilty (of sin)."
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: But verily thy Lord is full of grace to mankind: Yet most of them are ungrateful.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Nor is there aught of the unseen, in heaven or earth, but is (recorded) in a clear record.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Verily this Qur'an doth explain to the Children of Israel most of the matters in which they disagree.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Verily thy Lord will decide between them by His Decree: and He is Exalted in Might, All-Knowing.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: So put thy trust in Allah: for thou art on (the path of) manifest Truth.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Nor canst thou be a guide to the blind, (to prevent them) from straying: only those wilt thou get to listen who believe in Our Signs, and they will bow in Islam.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And when the Word is fulfilled against them (the unjust), we shall produce from the earth a beast to (face) them: He will speak to them, for that mankind did not believe with assurance in Our Signs.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: One day We shall gather together from every people a troop of those who reject our Signs, and they shall be kept in ranks,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Until, when they come (before the Judgment-seat), (Allah) will say: "Did ye reject My Signs, though ye comprehended them not in knowledge, or what was it ye did?"
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And the Word will be fulfilled against them, because of their wrong-doing, and they will be unable to speak (in plea).
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: See they not that We have made the Night for them to rest in and the Day to give them light? Verily in this are Signs for any people that believe!
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu']

Text: And the Day that the Trumpet will be sounded - then will be smitten with terror those who are in the heavens, and those who are on earth, except such as Allah will please (to exempt): and all shall come to His (Presence) as beings conscious of their lowliness.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Thou seest the mountains and thinkest them firmly fixed: but they shall pass away as the clouds pass away: (such is) the artistry of Allah, who disposes of all things in perfect order: for he is well acquainted with all that ye do.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And if any do evil, their faces will be thrown headlong into the Fire: "Do ye receive a reward other than that which ye have earned by your deeds?"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For me, I have been commanded to serve the Lord of this city, Him Who has sanctified it and to Whom (belong) all things: and I am commanded to be of those who bow in Islam to Allah's Will,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And to rehearse the Qur'an: and if any accept guidance, they do it for the good of their own souls, and if any stray, say: "I am only a Warner".
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And say: "Praise be to Allah, Who will soon show you His Signs, so that ye shall know them"; and thy Lord is not unmindful of all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Ta. Sin. Mim.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: We rehearse to thee some of the story of Moses and Pharaoh in Truth, for people who believe.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Truly Pharaoh elated himself in the land and broke up its people into sections, depressing a small group among them: their sons he slew, but he kept alive their females: for he was indeed a maker of mischief.
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And We wished to be Gracious to those who were being depressed in the land, to make them leaders (in Faith) and make them heirs,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: To establish a firm place for them in the land, and to show Pharaoh, Haman, and their hosts, at their hands, the very things against which they were taking precautions.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: So We sent this inspiration to the mother of Moses: "Suckle (thy child), but when thou hast fears about him, cast him into the river, but fear not nor grieve: for We shall restore him to thee, and We shall make him one of Our messengers."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Then the people of Pharaoh picked him up (from the river): (It was intended) that (Moses) should be to them an adversary and a cause of sorrow: for Pharaoh and Haman and (all) their hosts were men of sin.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: The wife of Pharaoh said: "(Here is) joy of the eye, for me and for thee: slay him not. It may be that he will be use to us, or we may adopt him as a son." And they perceived not (what they were doing)!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But there came to be a void in the heart of the mother of Moses: She was going almost to disclose his (case), had We not strengthened her heart (with faith), so that she might remain a (firm) believer.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: And she said to the sister of (Moses), "Follow him" so she (the sister) watched him in the character of a stranger. And they knew not.
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: And we ordained that he refused suck at first, until (His sister came up and) said: "Shall I point out to you the people of a house that will nourish and bring him up for you and be sincerely attached to him?"...
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Thus did We restore him to his mother, that her eye might be comforted, that she might not grieve, and that she might know that the promise of Allah is true: but most of them do not understand.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And he entered the city at a time when its people were not watching: and he found there two men fighting,- one of his own religion, and the other, of his foes. Now the man of his own religion appealed to him against his foe, and Moses struck him with his fist and made an end of him. He said: "This is a work of Evil (Satan): for he is an enemy that manifestly misleads!"
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: He prayed: "O my Lord! I have indeed wronged my soul! Do Thou then forgive me!" So (Allah) forgave him: for He is the Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! For that Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace on me, never shall I be a help to those who sin!"
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: So he saw the morning in the city, looking about, in a state of fear, when behold, the man who had, the day before, sought his help called aloud for his help (again). Moses said to him: "Thou art truly, it is clear, a quarrelsome fellow!"
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then, when he decided to lay hold of the man who was an enemy to both of them, that man said: "O Moses! Is it thy intention to slay me as thou slewest a man yesterday? Thy intention is none other than to become a powerful violent man in the land, and not to be one who sets things right!"
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And there came a man, running, from the furthest end of the City. He said: "O Moses! the Chiefs are taking counsel together about thee, to slay thee: so get thee away, for I do give thee sincere advice."
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He therefore got away therefrom, looking about, in a state of fear. He prayed "O my Lord! save me from people given to wrong-doing."
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Then, when he turned his face towards (the land of) Madyan, he said: "I do hope that my Lord will show me the smooth and straight Path."
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: And when he arrived at the watering (place) in Madyan, he found there a group of men watering (their flocks), and besides them he found two women who were keeping back (their flocks). He said: "What is the matter with you?" They said: "We cannot water (our flocks) until the shepherds take back (their flocks): And our father is a very old man."
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: So he watered (their flocks) for them; then he turned back to the shade, and said:"O my Lord! truly am I in (desperate) need of any good that Thou dost send me!"
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Afterwards one of the (damsels) came (back) to him, walking bashfully. She said: "My father invites thee that he may reward thee for having watered (our flocks) for us." So when he came to him and narrated the story, he said: "Fear thou not: (well) hast thou escaped from unjust people."
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Said one of the (damsels): "O my (dear) father! engage him on wages: truly the best of men for thee to employ is the (man) who is strong and trusty"....
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "I intend to wed one of these my daughters to thee, on condition that thou serve me for eight years; but if thou complete ten years, it will be (grace) from thee. But I intend not to place thee under a difficulty: thou wilt find me, indeed, if Allah wills, one of the righteous."
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "Be that (the agreement) between me and thee: whichever of the two terms I fulfil, let there be no ill-will to me. Be Allah a witness to what we say."
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Now when Moses had fulfilled the term, and was travelling with his family, he perceived a fire in the direction of Mount Tur. He said to his family: "Tarry ye; I perceive a fire; I hope to bring you from there some information, or a burning firebrand, that ye may warm yourselves."
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: But when he came to the (fire), a voice was heard from the right bank of the valley, from a tree in hallowed ground: "O Moses! Verily I am Allah, the Lord of the Worlds....
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "Now do thou throw thy rod!" but when he saw it moving (of its own accord) as if it had been a snake, he turned back in retreat, and retraced not his steps: O Moses!" (It was said), "Draw near, and fear not: for thou art of those who are secure.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "Move thy hand into thy bosom, and it will come forth white without stain (or harm), and draw thy hand close to thy side (to guard) against fear. Those are the two credentials from thy Lord to Pharaoh and his Chiefs: for truly they are a people rebellious and wicked."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! I have slain a man among them, and I fear lest they slay me.
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: "And my brother Aaron - He is more eloquent in speech than I: so send him with me as a helper, to confirm (and strengthen) me: for I fear that they may accuse me of falsehood."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: He said: "We will certainly strengthen thy arm through thy brother, and invest you both with authority, so they shall not be able to touch you: with Our Sign shall ye triumph,- you two as well as those who follow you."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: When Moses came to them with Our clear signs, they said: "This is nothing but sorcery faked up: never did we head the like among our fathers of old!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Moses said: "My Lord knows best who it is that comes with guidance from Him and whose end will be best in the Hereafter: certain it is that the wrong-doers will not prosper."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Pharaoh said: "O Chiefs! no god do I know for you but myself: therefore, O Haman! light me a (kiln to bake bricks) out of clay, and build me a lofty palace, that I may mount up to the god of Moses: but as far as I am concerned, I think (Moses) is a liar!"
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And he was arrogant and insolent in the land, beyond reason,- He and his hosts: they thought that they would not have to return to Us!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: So We seized him and his hosts, and We flung them into the sea: Now behold what was the end of those who did wrong!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And we made them (but) leaders inviting to the Fire; and on the Day of Judgment no help shall they find.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: in this world We made a curse to follow them and on the Day of Judgment they will be among the loathed (and despised).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: We did reveal to Moses the Book after We had destroyed the earlier generations, (to give) Insight to men, and guidance and Mercy, that they might receive admonition.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Thou wast not on the Western side when We decreed the Commission to Moses, nor wast thou a witness (of those events).
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But (now), when the Truth has come to them from Ourselves, they say, "Why are not (Signs) sent to him, like those which were sent to Moses?" Do they not then reject (the Signs) which were formerly sent to Moses? They say: "Two kinds of sorcery, each assisting the other!" And they say: "For us, we reject all (such things)!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: But if they hearken not to thee, know that they only follow their own lusts: and who is more astray than one who follow his own lusts, devoid of guidance from Allah? for Allah guides not people given to wrong-doing.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Those to whom We sent the Book before this,- they do believe in this (revelation):
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe therein, for it is the Truth from our Lord: indeed we have been Muslims (bowing to Allah's Will) from before this.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Twice will they be given their reward, for that they have persevered, that they avert Evil with Good, and that they spend (in charity) out of what We have given them.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And when they hear vain talk, they turn away therefrom and say: "To us our deeds, and to you yours; peace be to you: we seek not the ignorant."
Label: ['akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: It is true thou wilt not be able to guide every one, whom thou lovest; but Allah guides those whom He will and He knows best those who receive guidance.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: They say: "If we were to follow the guidance with thee, we should be snatched away from our land." Have We not established for them a secure sanctuary, to which are brought as tribute fruits of all kinds,- a provision from Ourselves? but most of them understand not.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And how many populations We destroyed, which exulted in their life (of ease and plenty)! now those habitations of theirs, after them, are deserted,- All but a (miserable) few! and We are their heirs!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Nor was thy Lord the one to destroy a population until He had sent to its centre a messenger, rehearsing to them Our Signs; nor are We going to destroy a population except when its members practise iniquity.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The (material) things which ye are given are but the conveniences of this life and the glitter thereof; but that which is with Allah is better and more enduring: will ye not then be wise?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say "Where are my 'partners'?- whom ye imagined (to be such)?"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Those against whom the charge will be proved, will say: "Our Lord! These are the ones whom we led astray: we led them astray, as we were astray ourselves: we free ourselves (from them) in Thy presence: it was not us they worshipped."
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: It will be said (to them): "Call upon your 'partners' (for help)": they will call upon them, but they will not listen to them; and they will see the Penalty (before them); (how they will wish) 'if only they had been open to guidance!'
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say: "What was the answer ye gave to the messengers?"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Then the (whole) story that Day will seem obscure to them (like light to the blind) and they will not be able (even) to question each other.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But any that (in this life) had repented, believed, and worked righteousness, will have hopes to be among those who achieve salvation.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And He is Allah: There is no god but He. To Him be praise, at the first and at the last: for Him is the Command, and to Him shall ye (all) be brought back.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: It is out of His Mercy that He has made for you Night and Day,- that ye may rest therein, and that ye may seek of his Grace;- and in order that ye may be grateful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Qarun was doubtless, of the people of Moses; but he acted insolently towards them: such were the treasures We had bestowed on him that their very keys would have been a burden to a body of strong men, behold, his people said to him: "Exult not, for Allah loveth not those who exult (in riches).
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: "But seek, with the (wealth) which Allah has bestowed on thee, the Home of the Hereafter, nor forget thy portion in this world: but do thou good, as Allah has been good to thee, and seek not (occasions for) mischief in the land: for Allah loves not those who do mischief."
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He said: "This has been given to me because of a certain knowledge which I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed, before him, (whole) generations,- which were superior to him in strength and greater in the amount (of riches) they had collected? but the wicked are not called (immediately) to account for their sins.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: So he went forth among his people in the (pride of his wordly) glitter. Said those whose aim is the Life of this World: "Oh! that we had the like of what Qarun has got! for he is truly a lord of mighty good fortune!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But those who had been granted (true) knowledge said: "Alas for you! The reward of Allah (in the Hereafter) is best for those who believe and work righteousness: but this none shall attain, save those who steadfastly persevere (in good)."
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']
