Text: And We caused the earth to gush forth with springs, so the waters met (and rose) to the extent decreed.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: But We bore him on an (Ark) made of broad planks and caulked with palm-fibre:
Label: ['kisah']

Text: She floats under our eyes (and care): a recompense to one who had been rejected (with scorn)!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And We have left this as a Sign (for all time): then is there any that will receive admonition?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning?
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The 'Ad (people) (too) rejected (Truth): then how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: For We sent against them a furious wind, on a Day of violent Disaster,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Plucking out men as if they were roots of palm-trees torn up (from the ground).
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: But We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The Thamud (also) rejected (their) Warners.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: For they said: "What! a man! a Solitary one from among ourselves! shall we follow such a one? Truly should we then be straying in mind, and mad!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: "Is it that the Message is sent to him, of all people amongst us? Nay, he is a liar, an insolent one!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The people of Lut rejected (his) warning.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: We sent against them a violent Tornado with showers of stones, (which destroyed them), except Lut's household: them We delivered by early Dawn,-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And they even sought to snatch away his guests from him, but We blinded their eyes. (They heard:) "Now taste ye My Wrath and My Warning."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: To the People of Pharaoh, too, aforetime, came Warners (from Allah).
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: The (people) rejected all Our Signs; but We seized them with such Penalty (as comes) from One Exalted in Power, able to carry out His Will.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Nay, the Hour (of Judgment) is the time promised them (for their full recompense): And that Hour will be most grievous and most bitter.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The Day they will be dragged through the Fire on their faces, (they will hear:) "Taste ye the touch of Hell!"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: All that they do is noted in (their) Books (of Deeds):
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Every matter, small and great, is on record.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: As to the Righteous, they will be in the midst of Gardens and Rivers,
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: In an Assembly of Truth, in the Presence of a Sovereign Omnipotent.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (Allah) Most Gracious!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: It is He Who has taught the Qur'an.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He has created man:
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: The sun and the moon follow courses (exactly) computed;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the herbs and the trees - both (alike) prostrate in adoration.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the Firmament has He raised high, and He has set up the Balance (of Justice),
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: In order that ye may not transgress (due) balance.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: So establish weight with justice and fall not short in the balance.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: It is He Who has spread out the earth for (His) creatures:
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Therein is fruit and date-palms, producing spathes (enclosing dates);
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Also corn, with (its) leaves and stalk for fodder, and sweet-smelling plants.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: He created man from sounding clay like unto pottery,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And He created Jinns from fire free of smoke:
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: He has let free the two bodies of flowing water, meeting together:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Between them is a Barrier which they do not transgress:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Out of them come Pearls and Coral:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And His are the Ships sailing smoothly through the seas, lofty as mountains:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: All that is on earth will perish:
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: But will abide (for ever) the Face of thy Lord,- full of Majesty, Bounty and Honour.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: O ye assembly of Jinns and men! If it be ye can pass beyond the zones of the heavens and the earth, pass ye! not without authority shall ye be able to pass!
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: On you will be sent (O ye evil ones twain!) a flame of fire (to burn) and a smoke (to choke): no defence will ye have:
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: When the sky is rent asunder, and it becomes red like ointment:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: This is the Hell which the Sinners deny:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In its midst and in the midst of boiling hot water will they wander round!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But for such as fear the time when they will stand before (the Judgment Seat of) their Lord, there will be two Gardens-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Containing all kinds (of trees and delights);-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In them (each) will be two Springs flowing (free);
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In them will be Fruits of every kind, two and two.
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: They will recline on Carpets, whose inner linings will be of rich brocade: the Fruit of the Gardens will be near (and easy of reach).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In them will be (Maidens), chaste, restraining their glances, whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Like unto Rubies and coral.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And besides these two, there are two other Gardens,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Dark-green in colour (from plentiful watering).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In them (each) will be two Springs pouring forth water in continuous abundance:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In them will be Fruits, and dates and pomegranates:
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: In them will be fair (Companions), good, beautiful;-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Companions restrained (as to their glances), in (goodly) pavilions;-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Reclining on green Cushions and rich Carpets of beauty.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: When the Event inevitable cometh to pass,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Then will no (soul) entertain falsehood concerning its coming.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (Many) will it bring low; (many) will it exalt;
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: When the earth shall be shaken to its depths,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And the mountains shall be crumbled to atoms,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Becoming dust scattered abroad,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And ye shall be sorted out into three classes.
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Then (there will be) the Companions of the Right Hand;- What will be the Companions of the Right Hand?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And the Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And those Foremost (in Faith) will be Foremost (in the Hereafter).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: These will be those Nearest to Allah:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In Gardens of Bliss:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: A number of people from those of old,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And a few from those of later times.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (They will be) on Thrones encrusted (with gold and precious stones),
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Reclining on them, facing each other.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness),
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: With goblets, (shining) beakers, and cups (filled) out of clear-flowing fountains:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: No after-ache will they receive therefrom, nor will they suffer intoxication:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And with fruits, any that they may select:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And the flesh of fowls, any that they may desire.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And (there will be) Companions with beautiful, big, and lustrous eyes,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Like unto Pearls well-guarded.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: A Reward for the deeds of their past (life).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Not frivolity will they hear therein, nor any taint of ill,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Only the saying, "Peace! Peace".
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The Companions of the Right Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Right Hand?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (They will be) among Lote-trees without thorns,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Among Talh trees with flowers (or fruits) piled one above another,-
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: In shade long-extended,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: By water flowing constantly,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And fruit in abundance.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Whose season is not limited, nor (supply) forbidden,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And on Thrones (of Dignity), raised high.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: We have created (their Companions) of special creation.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And made them virgin - pure (and undefiled), -
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Beloved (by nature), equal in age,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For the Companions of the Right Hand.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: A (goodly) number from those of old,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And a (goodly) number from those of later times.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (They will be) in the midst of a Fierce Blast of Fire and in Boiling Water,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And in the shades of Black Smoke:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Nothing (will there be) to refresh, nor to please:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For that they were wont to be indulged, before that, in wealth (and luxury),
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And persisted obstinately in wickedness supreme!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And they used to say, "What! when we die and become dust and bones, shall we then indeed be raised up again?-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: "(We) and our fathers of old?"
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Say: "Yea, those of old and those of later times,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "All will certainly be gathered together for the meeting appointed for a Day well-known.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Then will ye truly,- O ye that go wrong, and treat (Truth) as Falsehood!-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Ye will surely taste of the Tree of Zaqqum.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Then will ye fill your insides therewith,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "And drink Boiling Water on top of it:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Indeed ye shall drink like diseased camels raging with thirst!"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Such will be their entertainment on the Day of Requital!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: It is We Who have created you: why will ye not witness the Truth?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Do ye then see?- The (human Seed) that ye throw out,-
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Is it ye who create it, or are We the Creators?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: We have decreed Death to be your common lot, and We are not to be frustrated
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: from changing your Forms and creating you (again) in (forms) that ye know not.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And ye certainly know already the first form of creation: why then do ye not celebrate His praises?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: See ye the seed that ye sow in the ground?
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Is it ye that cause it to grow, or are We the Cause?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Were it Our Will, We could crumble it to dry powder, and ye would be left in wonderment,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: (Saying), "We are indeed left with debts (for nothing):
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: "Indeed are we shut out (of the fruits of our labour)"
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: See ye the water which ye drink?
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Do ye bring it down (in rain) from the cloud or do We?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Were it Our Will, We could make it salt (and unpalatable): then why do ye not give thanks?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: See ye the Fire which ye kindle?
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Is it ye who grow the tree which feeds the fire, or do We grow it?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: We have made it a memorial (of Our handiwork), and an article of comfort and convenience for the denizens of deserts.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Then celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme!
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: Furthermore I call to witness the setting of the Stars,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And that is indeed a mighty adjuration if ye but knew,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: That this is indeed a qur'an Most Honourable,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: In Book well-guarded,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Which none shall touch but those who are clean:
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: A Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (There is for him) Rest and Satisfaction, and a Garden of Delights.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (For him is the salutation), "Peace be unto thee", from the Companions of the Right Hand.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For him is Entertainment with Boiling Water.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: So celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth,- let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: It is He Who gives Life and Death; and He has Power over all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He is the First and the Last, the Evident and the Immanent: and He has full knowledge of all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: He it is Who created the heavens and the earth in Six Days, and is moreover firmly established on the Throne (of Authority). He knows what enters within the earth and what comes forth out of it, what comes down from heaven and what mounts up to it. And He is with you wheresoever ye may be. And Allah sees well all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: and all affairs are referred back to Allah.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Believe in Allah and His messenger, and spend (in charity) out of the (substance) whereof He has made you heirs. For, those of you who believe and spend (in charity),- for them is a great Reward.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: He is the One Who sends to His Servant Manifest Signs, that He may lead you from the depths of Darkness into the Light and verily Allah is to you most kind and Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And what cause have ye why ye should not spend in the cause of Allah?- For to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth. Not equal among you are those who spent (freely) and fought, before the Victory, (with those who did so later). Those are higher in rank than those who spent (freely) and fought afterwards. But to all has Allah promised a goodly (reward). And Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Who is he that will Loan to Allah a beautiful loan? for (Allah) will increase it manifold to his credit, and he will have (besides) a liberal Reward.
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: One Day shalt thou see the believing men and the believing women- how their Light runs forward before them and by their right hands: (their greeting will be): "Good News for you this Day! Gardens beneath which flow rivers! to dwell therein for aye! This is indeed the highest Achievement!"
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: One Day will the Hypocrites- men and women - say to the Believers: "Wait for us! Let us borrow (a Light) from your Light!" It will be said: "Turn ye back to your rear! then seek a Light (where ye can)!" So a wall will be put up betwixt them, with a gate therein. Within it will be Mercy throughout, and without it, all alongside, will be (Wrath and) Punishment!
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: "This Day shall no ransom be accepted of you, nor of those who rejected Allah." Your abode is the Fire: that is the proper place to claim you: and an evil refuge it is!"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Has not the Time arrived for the Believers that their hearts in all humility should engage in the remembrance of Allah and of the Truth which has been revealed (to them), and that they should not become like those to whom was given Revelation aforetime, but long ages passed over them and their hearts grew hard? For many among them are rebellious transgressors.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Know ye (all) that Allah giveth life to the earth after its death! already have We shown the Signs plainly to you, that ye may learn wisdom.
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: For those who give in Charity, men and women, and loan to Allah a Beautiful Loan, it shall be increased manifold (to their credit), and they shall have (besides) a liberal reward.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And those who believe in Allah and His messengers- they are the Sincere (lovers of Truth), and the witnesses (who testify), in the eyes of their Lord: They shall have their Reward and their Light. But those who reject Allah and deny Our Signs,- they are the Companions of Hell-Fire.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Know ye (all), that the life of this world is but play and amusement, pomp and mutual boasting and multiplying, (in rivalry) among yourselves, riches and children. Here is a similitude: How rain and the growth which it brings forth, delight (the hearts of) the tillers; soon it withers; thou wilt see it grow yellow; then it becomes dry and crumbles away. But in the Hereafter is a Penalty severe (for the devotees of wrong). And Forgiveness from Allah and (His) Good Pleasure (for the devotees of Allah). And what is the life of this world, but goods and chattels of deception?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Be ye foremost (in seeking) Forgiveness from your Lord, and a Garden (of Bliss), the width whereof is as the width of heaven and earth, prepared for those who believe in Allah and His messengers: that is the Grace of Allah, which He bestows on whom he pleases: and Allah is the Lord of Grace abounding.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: No misfortune can happen on earth or in your souls but is recorded in a decree before We bring it into existence: That is truly easy for Allah:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: In order that ye may not despair over matters that pass you by, nor exult over favours bestowed upon you. For Allah loveth not any vainglorious boaster,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Such persons as are covetous and commend covetousness to men. And if any turn back (from Allah's Way), verily Allah is Free of all Needs, Worthy of all Praise.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: We sent aforetime our messengers with Clear Signs and sent down with them the Book and the Balance (of Right and Wrong), that men may stand forth in justice; and We sent down Iron, in which is (material for) mighty war, as well as many benefits for mankind, that Allah may test who it is that will help, Unseen, Him and His messengers: For Allah is Full of Strength, Exalted in Might (and able to enforce His Will).
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And We sent Noah and Abraham, and established in their line Prophethood and Revelation: and some of them were on right guidance. But many of them became rebellious transgressors.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Then, in their wake, We followed them up with (others of) Our messengers: We sent after them Jesus the son of Mary, and bestowed on him the Gospel; and We ordained in the hearts of those who followed him Compassion and Mercy. But the Monasticism which they invented for themselves, We did not prescribe for them: (We commanded) only the seeking for the Good Pleasure of Allah; but that they did not foster as they should have done. Yet We bestowed, on those among them who believed, their (due) reward, but many of them are rebellious transgressors.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: O ye that believe! Fear Allah, and believe in His Messenger, and He will bestow on you a double portion of His Mercy: He will provide for you a Light by which ye shall walk (straight in your path), and He will forgive you (your past): for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Allah has indeed heard (and accepted) the statement of the woman who pleads with thee concerning her husband and carries her complaint (in prayer) to Allah: and Allah (always) hears the arguments between both sides among you: for Allah hears and sees (all things).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: If any men among you divorce their wives by Zihar (calling them mothers), they cannot be their mothers: None can be their mothers except those who gave them birth. And in fact they use words (both) iniquitous and false: but truly Allah is one that blots out (sins), and forgives (again and again).
Label: ['syariah']

Text: But those who divorce their wives by Zihar, then wish to go back on the words they uttered,- (It is ordained that such a one) should free a slave before they touch each other: Thus are ye admonished to perform: and Allah is well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: And if any has not (the wherewithal), he should fast for two months consecutively before they touch each other. But if any is unable to do so, he should feed sixty indigent ones, this, that ye may show your faith in Allah and His Messenger. Those are limits (set by) Allah. For those who reject (Him), there is a grievous Penalty.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: On the Day that Allah will raise them all up (again) and show them the Truth (and meaning) of their conduct. Allah has reckoned its (value), though they may have forgotten it, for Allah is Witness to all things.
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah doth know (all) that is in the heavens and on earth? There is not a secret consultation between three, but He makes the fourth among them, - Nor between five but He makes the sixth,- nor between fewer nor more, but He is in their midst, wheresoever they be: In the end will He tell them the truth of their conduct, on the Day of Judgment. For Allah has full knowledge of all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Turnest thou not thy sight towards those who were forbidden secret counsels yet revert to that which they were forbidden (to do)? And they hold secret counsels among themselves for iniquity and hostility, and disobedience to the Messenger. And when they come to thee, they salute thee, not as Allah salutes thee, (but in crooked ways): And they say to themselves, "Why does not Allah punish us for our words?" Enough for them is Hell: In it will they burn, and evil is that destination!
Label: ['akhlak', 'ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: O ye who believe! When ye hold secret counsel, do it not for iniquity and hostility, and disobedience to the Prophet; but do it for righteousness and self-restraint; and fear Allah, to Whom ye shall be brought back.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Secret counsels are only (inspired) by the Evil One, in order that he may cause grief to the Believers; but he cannot harm them in the least, except as Allah permits; and on Allah let the Believers put their trust.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: O ye who believe! When ye are told to make room in the assemblies, (spread out and) make room: (ample) room will Allah provide for you. And when ye are told to rise up, rise up Allah will rise up, to (suitable) ranks (and degrees), those of you who believe and who have been granted (mystic) Knowledge. And Allah is well-acquainted with all ye do.
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: O ye who believe! When ye consult the Messenger in private, spend something in charity before your private consultation. That will be best for you, and most conducive to purity (of conduct). But if ye find not (the wherewithal), Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Is it that ye are afraid of spending sums in charity before your private consultation (with him)? If, then, ye do not so, and Allah forgives you, then (at least) establish regular prayer; practise regular charity; and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu']

Text: Turnest thou not thy attention to those who turn (in friendship) to such as have the Wrath of Allah upon them? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to falsehood knowingly.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: Allah has prepared for them a severe Penalty: evil indeed are their deeds.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: They have made their oaths a screen (for their misdeeds): thus they obstruct (men) from the Path of Allah: therefore shall they have a humiliating Penalty.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Of no profit whatever to them, against Allah, will be their riches nor their sons: they will be Companions of the Fire, to dwell therein (for aye)!
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: Thou wilt not find any people who believe in Allah and the Last Day, loving those who resist Allah and His Messenger, even though they were their fathers or their sons, or their brothers, or their kindred. For such He has written Faith in their hearts, and strengthened them with a spirit from Himself. And He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein (for ever). Allah will be well pleased with them, and they with Him. They are the Party of Allah. Truly it is the Party of Allah that will achieve Felicity.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: It is He Who got out the Unbelievers among the People of the Book from their homes at the first gathering (of the forces). Little did ye think that they would get out: And they thought that their fortresses would defend them from Allah! But the (Wrath of) Allah came to them from quarters from which they little expected (it), and cast terror into their hearts, so that they destroyed their dwellings by their own hands and the hands of the Believers, take warning, then, O ye with eyes (to see)!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And had it not been that Allah had decreed banishment for them, He would certainly have punished them in this world: And in the Hereafter they shall (certainly) have the Punishment of the Fire.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: That is because they resisted Allah and His Messenger: and if any one resists Allah, verily Allah is severe in Punishment.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Whether ye cut down (O ye Muslim!) The tender palm-trees, or ye left them standing on their roots, it was by leave of Allah, and in order that He might cover with shame the rebellious transgresses.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: What Allah has bestowed on His Messenger (and taken away) from them - for this ye made no expedition with either cavalry or camelry: but Allah gives power to His messengers over any He pleases: and Allah has power over all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: What Allah has bestowed on His Messenger (and taken away) from the people of the townships,- belongs to Allah,- to His Messenger and to kindred and orphans, the needy and the wayfarer; In order that it may not (merely) make a circuit between the wealthy among you. So take what the Messenger assigns to you, and deny yourselves that which he withholds from you. And fear Allah; for Allah is strict in Punishment.
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: But those who before them, had homes (in Medina) and had adopted the Faith,- show their affection to such as came to them for refuge, and entertain no desire in their hearts for things given to the (latter), but give them preference over themselves, even though poverty was their (own lot). And those saved from the covetousness of their own souls,- they are the ones that achieve prosperity.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And those who came after them say: "Our Lord! Forgive us, and our brethren who came before us into the Faith, and leave not, in our hearts, rancour (or sense of injury) against those who have believed. Our Lord! Thou art indeed Full of Kindness, Most Merciful."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: Hast thou not observed the Hypocrites say to their misbelieving brethren among the People of the Book? - "If ye are expelled, we too will go out with you, and we will never hearken to any one in your affair; and if ye are attacked (in fight) we will help you". But Allah is witness that they are indeed liars.
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: If they are expelled, never will they go out with them; and if they are attacked (in fight), they will never help them; and if they do help them, they will turn their backs; so they will receive no help.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Of a truth ye are stronger (than they) because of the terror in their hearts, (sent) by Allah. This is because they are men devoid of understanding.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: They will not fight you (even) together, except in fortified townships, or from behind walls. Strong is their fighting (spirit) amongst themselves: thou wouldst think they were united, but their hearts are divided: that is because they are a people devoid of wisdom.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Like those who lately preceded them, they have tasted the evil result of their conduct; and (in the Hereafter there is) for them a grievous Penalty;-
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: (Their allies deceived them), like the Evil One, when he says to man, "Deny Allah": but when (man) denies Allah, (the Evil One) says, "I am free of thee: I do fear Allah, the Lord of the Worlds!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: The end of both will be that they will go into the Fire, dwelling therein for ever. Such is the reward of the wrong-doers.
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and let every soul look to what (provision) He has sent forth for the morrow. Yea, fear Allah: for Allah is well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And be ye not like those who forgot Allah; and He made them forget their own souls! Such are the rebellious transgressors!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Not equal are the Companions of the Fire and the Companions of the Garden: it is the Companions of the Garden, that will achieve Felicity.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Had We sent down this Qur'an on a mountain, verily, thou wouldst have seen it humble itself and cleave asunder for fear of Allah. Such are the similitudes which We propound to men, that they may reflect.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Allah is He, than Whom there is no other god;- Who knows (all things) both secret and open; He, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Allah is He, than Whom there is no other god;- the Sovereign, the Holy One, the Source of Peace (and Perfection), the Guardian of Faith, the Preserver of Safety, the Exalted in Might, the Irresistible, the Supreme: Glory to Allah! (High is He) above the partners they attribute to Him.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He is Allah, the Creator, the Evolver, the Bestower of Forms (or Colours). To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names: whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare His Praises and Glory: and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Truly Allah loves those who fight in His Cause in battle array, as if they were a solid cemented structure.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And remember, Moses said to his people: "O my people! why do ye vex and insult me, though ye know that I am the messenger of Allah (sent) to you?" Then when they went wrong, Allah let their hearts go wrong. For Allah guides not those who are rebellious transgressors.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: And remember, Jesus, the son of Mary, said: "O Children of Israel! I am the messenger of Allah (sent) to you, confirming the Law (which came) before me, and giving Glad Tidings of a Messenger to come after me, whose name shall be Ahmad." But when he came to them with Clear Signs, they said, "this is evident sorcery!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Who doth greater wrong than one who invents falsehood against Allah, even as he is being invited to Islam? And Allah guides not those who do wrong.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with Guidance and the Religion of Truth, that he may proclaim it over all religion, even though the Pagans may detest (it).
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: That ye believe in Allah and His Messenger, and that ye strive (your utmost) in the Cause of Allah, with your property and your persons: That will be best for you, if ye but knew!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: He will forgive you your sins, and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, and to beautiful mansions in Gardens of Eternity: that is indeed the Supreme Achievement.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: O ye who believe! Be ye helpers of Allah: As said Jesus the son of Mary to the Disciples, "Who will be my helpers to (the work of) Allah?" Said the disciples, "We are Allah's helpers!" then a portion of the Children of Israel believed, and a portion disbelieved: But We gave power to those who believed, against their enemies, and they became the ones that prevailed.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah']

Text: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah,- the Sovereign, the Holy One, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: As well as (to confer all these benefits upon) others of them, who have not already joined them: And He is exalted in Might, Wise.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The similitude of those who were charged with the (obligations of the) Mosaic Law, but who subsequently failed in those (obligations), is that of a donkey which carries huge tomes (but understands them not). Evil is the similitude of people who falsify the Signs of Allah: and Allah guides not people who do wrong.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: Say: "O ye that stand on Judaism! If ye think that ye are friends to Allah, to the exclusion of (other) men, then express your desire for Death, if ye are truthful!"
Label: ['akhlak', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Say: "The Death from which ye flee will truly overtake you: then will ye be sent back to the Knower of things secret and open: and He will tell you (the truth of) the things that ye did!"
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: O ye who believe! When the call is proclaimed to prayer on Friday (the Day of Assembly), hasten earnestly to the Remembrance of Allah, and leave off business (and traffic): That is best for you if ye but knew!
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And when the Prayer is finished, then may ye disperse through the land, and seek of the Bounty of Allah: and celebrate the Praises of Allah often (and without stint): that ye may prosper.
Label: ['syariah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: But when they see some bargain or some amusement, they disperse headlong to it, and leave thee standing. Say: "The (blessing) from the Presence of Allah is better than any amusement or bargain! and Allah is the Best to provide (for all needs)."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: When the Hypocrites come to thee, they say, "We bear witness that thou art indeed the Messenger of Allah." Yea, Allah knoweth that thou art indeed His Messenger, and Allah beareth witness that the Hypocrites are indeed liars.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: They have made their oaths a screen (for their misdeeds): thus they obstruct (men) from the Path of Allah: truly evil are their deeds.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: That is because they believed, then they rejected Faith: So a seal was set on their hearts: therefore they understand not.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When thou lookest at them, their exteriors please thee; and when they speak, thou listenest to their words. They are as (worthless as hollow) pieces of timber propped up, (unable to stand on their own). They think that every cry is against them. They are the enemies; so beware of them. The curse of Allah be on them! How are they deluded (away from the Truth)!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will pray for your forgiveness", they turn aside their heads, and thou wouldst see them turning away their faces in arrogance.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: It is equal to them whether thou pray for their forgiveness or not. Allah will not forgive them. Truly Allah guides not rebellious transgressors.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: They are the ones who say, "Spend nothing on those who are with Allah's Messenger, to the end that they may disperse (and quit Medina)." But to Allah belong the treasures of the heavens and the earth; but the Hypocrites understand not.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: They say, "If we return to Medina, surely the more honourable (element) will expel therefrom the meaner." But honour belongs to Allah and His Messenger, and to the Believers; but the Hypocrites know not.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: O ye who believe! Let not your riches or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. If any act thus, the loss is their own.
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: and spend something (in charity) out of the substance which We have bestowed on you, before Death should come to any of you and he should say, "O my Lord! why didst Thou not give me respite for a little while? I should then have given (largely) in charity, and I should have been one of the doers of good".
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: But to no soul will Allah grant respite when the time appointed (for it) has come; and Allah is well acquainted with (all) that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: to Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs praise: and He has power over all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: It is He Who has created you; and of you are some that are Unbelievers, and some that are Believers: and Allah sees well all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He has created the heavens and the earth in just proportions, and has given you shape, and made your shapes beautiful: and to Him is the final Goal.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth; and He knows what ye conceal and what ye reveal: yea, Allah knows well the (secrets) of (all) hearts.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Has not the story reached you, of those who rejected Faith aforetime? So they tasted the evil result of their conduct; and they had a grievous Penalty.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: That was because there came to them messengers with Clear Signs, but they said: "Shall (mere) human beings direct us?" So they rejected (the Message) and turned away. But Allah can do without (them): and Allah is free of all needs, worthy of all praise.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: The Unbelievers think that they will not be raised up (for Judgment). Say: "Yea, By my Lord, Ye shall surely be raised up: then shall ye be told (the truth) of all that ye did. And that is easy for Allah."
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Believe, therefore, in Allah and His Messenger, and in the Light which we have sent down. And Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The Day that He assembles you (all) for a Day of Assembly,- that will be a Day of mutual loss and gain (among you), and those who believe in Allah and work righteousness,- He will remove from them their ills, and He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: that will be the Supreme Achievement.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: But those who reject Faith and treat Our Signs as falsehoods, they will be Companions of the Fire, to dwell therein for aye: and evil is that Goal.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: So obey Allah, and obey His Messenger: but if ye turn back, the duty of Our Messenger is but to proclaim (the Message) clearly and openly.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: Allah! There is no god but He: and on Allah, therefore, let the Believers put their trust.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: O ye who believe! Truly, among your wives and your children are (some that are) enemies to yourselves: so beware of them! But if ye forgive and overlook, and cover up (their faults), verily Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Your riches and your children may be but a trial: but in the Presence of Allah, is the highest, Reward.
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: So fear Allah as much as ye can; listen and obey and spend in charity for the benefit of your own soul and those saved from the covetousness of their own souls,- they are the ones that achieve prosperity.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: If ye loan to Allah, a beautiful loan, He will double it to your (credit), and He will grant you Forgiveness: for Allah is most Ready to appreciate (service), Most Forbearing,-
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Knower of what is open, Exalted in Might, Full of Wisdom.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: O Prophet! When ye do divorce women, divorce them at their prescribed periods, and count (accurately), their prescribed periods: And fear Allah your Lord: and turn them not out of their houses, nor shall they (themselves) leave, except in case they are guilty of some open lewdness, those are limits set by Allah: and any who transgresses the limits of Allah, does verily wrong his (own) soul: thou knowest not if perchance Allah will bring about thereafter some new situation.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Thus when they fulfil their term appointed, either take them back on equitable terms or part with them on equitable terms; and take for witness two persons from among you, endued with justice, and establish the evidence (as) before Allah. Such is the admonition given to him who believes in Allah and the Last Day. And for those who fear Allah, He (ever) prepares a way out,
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And He provides for him from (sources) he never could imagine. And if any one puts his trust in Allah, sufficient is (Allah) for him. For Allah will surely accomplish his purpose: verily, for all things has Allah appointed a due proportion.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Such of your women as have passed the age of monthly courses, for them the prescribed period, if ye have any doubts, is three months, and for those who have no courses (it is the same): for those who carry (life within their wombs), their period is until they deliver their burdens: and for those who fear Allah, He will make their path easy.
Label: ['syariah', 'ilmu']

Text: That is the Command of Allah, which He has sent down to you: and if any one fears Allah, He will remove his ills, from him, and will enlarge his reward.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Let the women live (in 'iddat) in the same style as ye live, according to your means: Annoy them not, so as to restrict them. And if they carry (life in their wombs), then spend (your substance) on them until they deliver their burden: and if they suckle your (offspring), give them their recompense: and take mutual counsel together, according to what is just and reasonable. And if ye find yourselves in difficulties, let another woman suckle (the child) on the (father's) behalf.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: How many populations that insolently opposed the Command of their Lord and of His messengers, did We not then call to account,- to severe account?- and We imposed on them an exemplary Punishment.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Allah has prepared for them a severe Punishment (in the Hereafter). Therefore fear Allah, O ye men of understanding - who have believed!- for Allah hath indeed sent down to you a Message,-
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: An Messenger, who rehearses to you the Signs of Allah containing clear explanations, that he may lead forth those who believe and do righteous deeds from the depths of Darkness into Light. And those who believe in Allah and work righteousness, He will admit to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: Allah has indeed granted for them a most excellent Provision.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Allah is He Who created seven Firmaments and of the earth a similar number. Through the midst of them (all) descends His Command: that ye may know that Allah has power over all things, and that Allah comprehends, all things in (His) Knowledge.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: O Prophet! Why holdest thou to be forbidden that which Allah has made lawful to thee? Thou seekest to please thy consorts. But Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: Allah has already ordained for you, (O men), the dissolution of your oaths (in some cases): and Allah is your Protector, and He is Full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: When the Prophet disclosed a matter in confidence to one of his consorts, and she then divulged it (to another), and Allah made it known to him, he confirmed part thereof and repudiated a part. Then when he told her thereof, she said, "Who told thee this? "He said, "He told me Who knows and is well-acquainted (with all things)."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: If ye two turn in repentance to Him, your hearts are indeed so inclined; But if ye back up each other against him, truly Allah is his Protector, and Gabriel, and (every) righteous one among those who believe,- and furthermore, the angels - will back (him) up.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: It may be, if he divorced you (all), that Allah will give him in exchange consorts better than you,- who submit (their wills), who believe, who are devout, who turn to Allah in repentance, who worship (in humility), who travel (for Faith) and fast,- previously married or virgins.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: O ye who believe! save yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is Men and Stones, over which are (appointed) angels stern (and) severe, who flinch not (from executing) the Commands they receive from Allah, but do (precisely) what they are commanded.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: O ye who believe! Turn to Allah with sincere repentance: In the hope that your Lord will remove from you your ills and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow,- the Day that Allah will not permit to be humiliated the Prophet and those who believe with him. Their Light will run forward before them and by their right hands, while they say, "Our Lord! Perfect our Light for us, and grant us Forgiveness: for Thou hast power over all things."
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: O Prophet! Strive hard against the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites, and be firm against them. Their abode is Hell,- an evil refuge (indeed).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Allah sets forth, for an example to the Unbelievers, the wife of Noah and the wife of Lut: they were (respectively) under two of our righteous servants, but they were false to their (husbands), and they profited nothing before Allah on their account, but were told: "Enter ye the Fire along with (others) that enter!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And Allah sets forth, as an example to those who believe the wife of Pharaoh: Behold she said: "O my Lord! Build for me, in nearness to Thee, a mansion in the Garden, and save me from Pharaoh and his doings, and save me from those that do wrong";
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah']

Text: And Mary the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity; and We breathed into (her body) of Our spirit; and she testified to the truth of the words of her Lord and of His Revelations, and was one of the devout (servants).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Blessed be He in Whose hands is Dominion; and He over all things hath Power;-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He Who created Death and Life, that He may try which of you is best in deed: and He is the Exalted in Might, Oft-Forgiving;-
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He Who created the seven heavens one above another: No want of proportion wilt thou see in the Creation of (Allah) Most Gracious. So turn thy vision again: seest thou any flaw?
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Again turn thy vision a second time: (thy) vision will come back to thee dull and discomfited, in a state worn out.
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And we have, (from of old), adorned the lowest heaven with Lamps, and We have made such (Lamps) (as) missiles to drive away the Evil Ones, and have prepared for them the Penalty of the Blazing Fire.
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: For those who reject their Lord (and Cherisher) is the Penalty of Hell: and evil is (such), Destination.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: When they are cast therein, they will hear the (terrible) drawing in of its breath even as it blazes forth,
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Almost bursting with fury: Every time a Group is cast therein, its Keepers will ask, "Did no Warner come to you?"
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: They will say: "Yes indeed; a Warner did come to us, but we rejected him and said, 'Allah never sent down any (Message): ye are nothing but an egregious delusion!'"
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: They will further say: "Had we but listened or used our intelligence, we should not (now) be among the Companions of the Blazing Fire!"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: They will then confess their sins: but far will be (Forgiveness) from the Companions of the Blazing Fire!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: As for those who fear their Lord unseen, for them is Forgiveness and a great Reward.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: And whether ye hide your word or publish it, He certainly has (full) knowledge, of the secrets of (all) hearts.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Should He not know,- He that created? and He is the One that understands the finest mysteries (and) is well-acquainted (with them).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: It is He Who has made the earth manageable for you, so traverse ye through its tracts and enjoy of the Sustenance which He furnishes: but unto Him is the Resurrection.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Do ye feel secure that He Who is in heaven will not cause you to be swallowed up by the earth when it shakes (as in an earthquake)?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Or do ye feel secure that He Who is in Heaven will not send against you a violent tornado (with showers of stones), so that ye shall know how (terrible) was My warning?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Do they not observe the birds above them, spreading their wings and folding them in? None can uphold them except (Allah) Most Gracious: Truly (Allah) Most Gracious: Truly it is He that watches over all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Nay, who is there that can help you, (even as) an army, besides (Allah) Most Merciful? In nothing but delusion are the Unbelievers.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Or who is there that can provide you with Sustenance if He were to withhold His provision? Nay, they obstinately persist in insolent impiety and flight (from the Truth).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: "It is He Who has created you (and made you grow), and made for you the faculties of hearing, seeing, feeling and understanding: little thanks it is ye give.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Say: "It is He Who has multiplied you through the earth, and to Him shall ye be gathered together."
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Say: "As to the knowledge of the time, it is with Allah alone: I am (sent) only to warn plainly in public."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: At length, when they see it close at hand, grieved will be the faces of the Unbelievers, and it will be said (to them): "This is (the promise fulfilled), which ye were calling for!"
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Say: "He is (Allah) Most Gracious: We have believed in Him, and on Him have we put our trust: So, soon will ye know which (of us) it is that is in manifest error."
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Nun. By the Pen and the (Record) which (men) write,-
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Thou art not, by the Grace of thy Lord, mad or possessed.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Nay, verily for thee is a Reward unfailing:
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: And thou (standest) on an exalted standard of character.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Verily it is thy Lord that knoweth best, which (among men) hath strayed from His Path: and He knoweth best those who receive (true) Guidance.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Heed not the type of despicable men,- ready with oaths,
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: A slanderer, going about with calumnies,
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: When to him are rehearsed Our Signs, "Tales of the ancients", he cries!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Verily We have tried them as We tried the People of the Garden, when they resolved to gather the fruits of the (garden) in the morning.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But made no reservation, ("If it be Allah's Will").
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then there came on the (garden) a visitation from thy Lord, (which swept away) all around, while they were asleep.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So the (garden) became, by the morning, like a dark and desolate spot, (whose fruit had been gathered).
Label: ['kisah']

Text: As the morning broke, they called out, one to another,-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Go ye to your tilth (betimes) in the morning, if ye would gather the fruits."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: So they departed, conversing in secret low tones, (saying)-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Let not a single indigent person break in upon you into the (garden) this day."
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And they opened the morning, strong in an (unjust) resolve.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But when they saw the (garden), they said: "We have surely lost our way:
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Indeed we are shut out (of the fruits of our labour)!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Said one of them, more just (than the rest): "Did I not say to you, 'Why not glorify (Allah)?'"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: They said: "Glory to our Lord! Verily we have been doing wrong!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then they turned, one against another, in reproach.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: They said: "Alas for us! We have indeed transgressed!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "It may be that our Lord will give us in exchange a better (garden) than this: for we do turn to Him (in repentance)!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Such is the Punishment (in this life); but greater is the Punishment in the Hereafter,- if only they knew!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Verily, for the Righteous, are Gardens of Delight, in the Presence of their Lord.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: So wait with patience for the Command of thy Lord, and be not like the Companion of the Fish,- when he cried out in agony.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And the Unbelievers would almost trip thee up with their eyes when they hear the Message; and they say: "Surely he is possessed!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The Sure Reality!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: What is the Sure Reality?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And what will make thee realise what the Sure Reality is?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The Thamud and the 'Ad People (branded) as false the Stunning Calamity!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: But the Thamud,- they were destroyed by a terrible Storm of thunder and lightning!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And the 'Ad, they were destroyed by a furious Wind, exceedingly violent;
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He made it rage against them seven nights and eight days in succession: so that thou couldst see the (whole) people lying prostrate in its (path), as they had been roots of hollow palm-trees tumbled down!
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then seest thou any of them left surviving?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And Pharaoh, and those before him, and the Cities Overthrown, committed habitual Sin.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: And disobeyed (each) the messenger of their Lord; so He punished them with an abundant Penalty.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Then, when one blast is sounded on the Trumpet,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the earth is moved, and its mountains, and they are crushed to powder at one stroke,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: On that Day shall the (Great) Event come to pass.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the sky will be rent asunder, for it will that Day be flimsy,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the angels will be on its sides, and eight will, that Day, bear the Throne of thy Lord above them.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Then he that will be given his Record in his right hand will say: "Ah here! Read ye my Record!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And he that will be given his Record in his left hand, will say: "Ah! Would that my Record had not been given to me!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "Ah! Would that (Death) had made an end of me!
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: "Of no profit to me has been my wealth!
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: "This was he that would not believe in Allah Most High.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (This is) a Message sent down from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And if the messenger were to invent any sayings in Our name,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: We should certainly seize him by his right hand,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And We should certainly then cut off the artery of his heart:
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nor could any of you withhold him (from Our wrath).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But verily this is a Message for the Allah-fearing.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: So glorify the name of thy Lord Most High.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: We sent Noah to his People (with the Command): "Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty."
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: "That ye should worship Allah, fear Him and obey me:
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: "So He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a stated Term: for when the Term given by Allah is accomplished, it cannot be put forward: if ye only knew."
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! I have called to my People night and day:
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And every time I have called to them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, grown obstinate, and given themselves up to arrogance.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "So I have called to them aloud;
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Saying, 'Ask forgiveness from your Lord; for He is Oft-Forgiving;
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "'He will send rain to you in abundance;
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "'Give you increase in wealth and sons; and bestow on you gardens and bestow on you rivers (of flowing water).
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "'What is the matter with you, that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in Allah,-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "'Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "'See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "'And made the moon a light in their midst, and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: "'And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "'And in the End He will return you into the (earth), and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "'And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "'That ye may go about therein, in spacious roads.'"
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And they have said (to each other), 'Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa', neither Yaguth nor Ya'uq, nor Nasr';-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark)."
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood), and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of Allah- none to help them.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
Label: ['syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: "For, if Thou dost leave (any of) them, they will but mislead Thy devotees, and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "O my Lord! Forgive me, my parents, all who enter my house in Faith, and (all) believing men and believing women: and to the wrong-doers grant Thou no increase but in perdition!"
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Say: It has been revealed to me that a company of Jinns listened (to the Qur'an). They said, 'We have really heard a wonderful Recital!
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: 'It gives guidance to the Right, and we have believed therein: we shall not join (in worship) any (gods) with our Lord.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: 'And Exalted is the Majesty of our Lord: He has taken neither a wife nor a son.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: 'True, there were persons among mankind who took shelter with persons among the Jinns, but they increased them in folly.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: 'And they (came to) think as ye thought, that Allah would not raise up any one (to Judgment).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: 'And we pried into the secrets of heaven; but we found it filled with stern guards and flaming fires.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: 'And we understand not whether ill is intended to those on earth, or whether their Lord (really) intends to guide them to right conduct.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: 'There are among us some that are righteous, and some the contrary: we follow divergent paths.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: 'But we think that we can by no means frustrate Allah throughout the earth, nor can we frustrate Him by flight.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: 'Amongst us are some that submit their wills (to Allah), and some that swerve from justice. Now those who submit their wills - they have sought out (the path) of right conduct:
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: 'But those who swerve,- they are (but) fuel for Hell-fire'-
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: (And Allah's Message is): "If they (the Pagans) had (only) remained on the (right) Way, We should certainly have bestowed on them Rain in abundance.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "Unless I proclaim what I receive from Allah and His Messages: for any that disobey Allah and His Messenger,- for them is Hell: they shall dwell therein for ever."
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "He (alone) knows the Unseen, nor does He make any one acquainted with His Mysteries,-
Label: ['alam-ghaib']

Text: "Except a messenger whom He has chosen: and then He makes a band of watchers march before him and behind him,
Label: ['alam-ghaib']

Text: O thou folded in garments!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Stand (to prayer) by night, but not all night,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Half of it,- or a little less,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Or a little more; and recite the Qur'an in slow, measured rhythmic tones.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Soon shall We send down to thee a weighty Message.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (He is) Lord of the East and the West: there is no god but He: take Him therefore for (thy) Disposer of Affairs.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: One Day the earth and the mountains will be in violent commotion. And the mountains will be as a heap of sand poured out and flowing down.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: We have sent to you, (O men!) a messenger, to be a witness concerning you, even as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger; so We seized him with a heavy Punishment.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder? His Promise needs must be accomplished.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Thy Lord doth know that thou standest forth (to prayer) nigh two-thirds of the night, or half the night, or a third of the night, and so doth a party of those with thee. But Allah doth appoint night and day in due measure He knoweth that ye are unable to keep count thereof. So He hath turned to you (in mercy): read ye, therefore, of the Qur'an as much as may be easy for you. He knoweth that there may be (some) among you in ill-health; others travelling through the land, seeking of Allah's bounty; yet others fighting in Allah's Cause, read ye, therefore, as much of the Qur'an as may be easy (for you); and establish regular Prayer and give regular Charity; and loan to Allah a Beautiful Loan. And whatever good ye send forth for your souls ye shall find it in Allah's Presence,- yea, better and greater, in Reward and seek ye the Grace of Allah: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: O thou wrapped up (in the mantle)!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Arise and deliver thy warning!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And thy Lord do thou magnify!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And thy garments keep free from stain!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And all abomination shun!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nor expect, in giving, any increase (for thyself)!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But, for thy Lord's (Cause), be patient and constant!
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Then he turned back and was haughty;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Then said he: "This is nothing but magic, derived from of old;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Soon will I cast him into Hell-Fire!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And what will explain to thee what Hell-Fire is?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And We have set none but angels as Guardians of the Fire; and We have fixed their number only as a trial for Unbelievers,- in order that the People of the Book may arrive at certainty, and the Believers may increase in Faith,- and that no doubts may be left for the People of the Book and the Believers, and that those in whose hearts is a disease and the Unbelievers may say, "What symbol doth Allah intend by this?" Thus doth Allah leave to stray whom He pleaseth, and guide whom He pleaseth: and none can know the forces of thy Lord, except He and this is no other than a warning to mankind.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Nay, verily: By the Moon,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Every soul will be (held) in pledge for its deeds.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Except the Companions of the Right Hand.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: "What led you into Hell Fire?"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And I do call to witness the self-reproaching spirit: (Eschew Evil).
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Does man think that We cannot assemble his bones?
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Nay, We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: At length, when the sight is dazed,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And the moon is buried in darkness.
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And the sun and moon are joined together,-
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge?"
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: By no means! No place of safety!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Before thy Lord (alone), that Day will be the place of rest.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: That Day will Man be told (all) that he put forward, and all that he put back.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Nay, man will be evidence against himself,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Even though he were to put up his excuses.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nay, (ye men!) but ye love the fleeting life,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Some faces, that Day, will beam (in brightness and beauty);-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Looking towards their Lord;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And some faces, that Day, will be sad and dismal,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)?
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (Allah) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And of him He made two sexes, male and female.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'ilmu']

Text: Has not He, (the same), the power to give life to the dead?
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Verily We created Man from a drop of mingled sperm, in order to try him: So We gave him (the gifts), of Hearing and Sight.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: We showed him the Way: whether he be grateful or ungrateful (rests on his will).
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: They perform (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And they feed, for the love of Allah, the indigent, the orphan, and the captive,-
Label: ['syariah']

Text: (Saying),"We feed you for the sake of Allah alone: no reward do we desire from you, nor thanks.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And because they were patient and constant, He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Reclining in the (Garden) on raised thrones, they will see there neither the sun's (excessive heat) nor (the moon's) excessive cold.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness): If thou seest them, thou wouldst think them scattered Pearls.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: It is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to thee by stages.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Therefore be patient with constancy to the Command of thy Lord, and hearken not to the sinner or the ingrate among them.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening,
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Assuredly, what ye are promised must come to pass.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Then when the stars become dim;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the heaven is cleft asunder;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And when the messengers are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For the Day of Sorting out.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Have We not created you from a fluid (held) despicable?-
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: The which We placed in a place of rest, firmly fixed,
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: For a period (of gestation), determined (according to need)?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: The living and the dead,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And made therein mountains standing firm, lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)?
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: "Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: As to the Righteous, they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Concerning what are they disputing?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Concerning the Great News,
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: About which they cannot agree.
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Verily, they shall soon (come to) know!
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Verily, verily they shall soon (come to) know!
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Have We not made the earth as a wide expanse,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And the mountains as pegs?
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And (have We not) created you in pairs,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And made your sleep for rest,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And made the night as a covering,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And made the day as a means of subsistence?
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And (have We not) built over you the seven firmaments,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And placed (therein) a Light of Splendour?
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And do We not send down from the clouds water in abundance,
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetables,
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And gardens of luxurious growth?
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: The Day that the Trumpet shall be sounded, and ye shall come forth in crowds;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the heavens shall be opened as if there were doors,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And the mountains shall vanish, as if they were a mirage.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Truly Hell is as a place of ambush,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Verily for the Righteous there will be a fulfilment of (the heart's) desires;
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Gardens enclosed, and grapevines;
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And voluptuous women of equal age;
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And a cup full (to the brim).
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: No vanity shall they hear therein, nor Untruth:-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Recompense from thy Lord, a gift, (amply) sufficient,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (From) the Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between, (Allah) Most Gracious: None shall have power to argue with Him.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand forth in ranks, none shall speak except any who is permitted by (Allah) Most Gracious, and He will say what is right.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: That Day will be the sure Reality: Therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) return to his Lord!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Has the story of Moses reached thee?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, thy Lord did call to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa:-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "Go thou to Pharaoh for he has indeed transgressed all bounds:
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "And say to him, 'Wouldst thou that thou shouldst be purified (from sin)?-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: "'And that I guide thee to thy Lord, so thou shouldst fear Him?'"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then did (Moses) show him the Great Sign.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But (Pharaoh) rejected it and disobeyed (guidance);
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then he collected (his men) and made a proclamation,
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Saying, "I am your Lord, Most High".
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But Allah did punish him, (and made an) example of him, - in the Hereafter, as in this life.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Verily in this is an instructive warning for whosoever feareth (Allah).
Label: ['kisah']

Text: What! Are ye the more difficult to create or the heaven (above)? (Allah) hath constructed it:
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: On high hath He raised its canopy, and He hath given it order and perfection.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Its night doth He endow with darkness, and its splendour doth He bring out (with light).
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And the earth, moreover, hath He extended (to a wide expanse);
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He draweth out therefrom its moisture and its pasture;
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And the mountains hath He firmly fixed;-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: For use and convenience to you and your cattle.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: They ask thee about the Hour,-'When will be its appointed time?
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Wherein art thou (concerned) with the declaration thereof?
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: With thy Lord in the Limit fixed therefor.
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Thou art but a Warner for such as fear it.
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: The Day they see it, (It will be) as if they had tarried but a single evening, or (at most till) the following morn!
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: When the sun (with its spacious light) is folded up;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the stars fall, losing their lustre;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the mountains vanish (like a mirage);
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the she-camels, ten months with young, are left untended;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the oceans boil over with a swell;
Label: ['alam-dunia']
