Text: When the female (infant), buried alive, is questioned -
Label: ['syariah']

Text: For what crime she was killed;
Label: ['syariah']

Text: When the world on High is unveiled;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: So verily I call to witness the planets - that recede,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Go straight, or hide;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Nor is it the word of an evil spirit accursed.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: When whither go ye?
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Verily this is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds:
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: (With profit) to whoever among you wills to go straight:
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: But ye shall not will except as Allah wills,- the Cherisher of the Worlds.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: When the Sky is cleft asunder;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the Stars are scattered;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: When the Oceans are suffered to burst forth;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And when the Graves are turned upside down;-
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: O man! What has seduced thee from thy Lord Most Beneficent?-
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion, and gave thee a just bias;
Label: ['kisah']

Text: In whatever Form He wills, does He put thee together.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Woe to those that deal in fraud,-
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, exact full measure,
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Do they not think that they will be called to account?-
Label: ['syariah']

Text: On a Mighty Day,
Label: ['syariah']

Text: A Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: When Our Signs are rehearsed to him, he says, "Tales of the ancients!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: When the sky is rent asunder,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord, and it must needs (do so);-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And when the earth is flattened out,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord,- and it must needs (do so);- (then will come Home the full reality).
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: O thou man! Verily thou art ever toiling on towards thy Lord- painfully toiling,- but thou shalt meet Him.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Then he who is given his Record in his right hand,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Soon will his account be taken by an easy reckoning,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And he will turn to his people, rejoicing!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But he who is given his Record behind his back,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Soon will he cry for perdition,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And he will enter a Blazing Fire.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Truly, did he go about among his people, rejoicing!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Truly, did he think that he would not have to return (to Us)!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nay, nay! for his Lord was (ever) watchful of him!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: So I do call to witness the ruddy glow of Sunset;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: The Night and its Homing;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the Moon in her fullness:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Ye shall surely travel from stage to stage.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: What then is the matter with them, that they believe not?-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And when the Qur'an is read to them, they fall not prostrate,
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: But on the contrary the Unbelievers reject (it).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But Allah has full knowledge of what they secrete (in their breasts)
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: So announce to them a Penalty Grievous,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Except to those who believe and work righteous deeds: For them is a Reward that will never fail.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: By the sky, (displaying) the Zodiacal Signs;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the promised Day (of Judgment);
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By one that witnesses, and the subject of the witness;-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Woe to the makers of the pit (of fire),
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel:
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Behold! they sat over against the (fire),
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: And they witnessed (all) that they were doing against the Believers.
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: And they ill-treated them for no other reason than that they believed in Allah, Exalted in Power, Worthy of all Praise!-
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Him to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth! And Allah is Witness to all things.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Those who persecute (or draw into temptation) the Believers, men and women, and do not turn in repentance, will have the Penalty of Hell: They will have the Penalty of the Burning Fire.
Label: ['kisah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: For those who believe and do righteous deeds, will be Gardens; beneath which rivers flow: That is the great Salvation, (the fulfilment of all desires),
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Truly strong is the Grip (and Power) of thy Lord.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: It is He Who creates from the very beginning, and He can restore (life).
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And He is the Oft-Forgiving, Full of Loving-Kindness,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Lord of the Throne of Glory,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Doer (without let) of all that He intends.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah']

Text: Has the story reached thee, of the forces-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Of Pharaoh and the Thamud?
Label: ['kisah']

Text: And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But Allah doth encompass them from behind!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Nay, this is a Glorious Qur'an,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: (Inscribed) in a Tablet Preserved!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Sky and the Night-Visitant (therein);-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And what will explain to thee what the Night-Visitant is?-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: (It is) the Star of piercing brightness;-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: There is no soul but has a protector over it.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Now let man but think from what he is created!
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: He is created from a drop emitted-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: By the Firmament which returns (in its round),
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And by the Earth which opens out (for the gushing of springs or the sprouting of vegetation),-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Who hath created, and further, given order and proportion;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And Who bringeth out the (green and luscious) pasture,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And then doth make it (but) swarthy stubble.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: By degrees shall We teach thee to declare (the Message), so thou shalt not forget,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Therefore give admonition in case the admonition profits (the hearer).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And this is in the Books of the earliest (Revelation),-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: The Books of Abraham and Moses.
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Has the story reached thee of the overwhelming (Event)?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Some faces, that Day, will be humiliated,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Labouring (hard), weary,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The while they enter the Blazing Fire,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The while they are given, to drink, of a boiling hot spring,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: No food will there be for them but a bitter Dhari'
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (Other) faces that Day will be joyful,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Pleased with their striving,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In a Garden on high,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Where they shall hear no (word) of vanity:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Therein will be a bubbling spring:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Therein will be Thrones (of dignity), raised on high,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And cushions set in rows,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And rich carpets (all) spread out.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Do they not look at the Camels, how they are made?-
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And at the Sky, how it is raised high?-
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And at the Mountains, how they are fixed firm?-
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And at the Earth, how it is spread out?
Label: ['ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Therefore do thou give admonition, for thou art one to admonish.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Thou art not one to manage (men's) affairs.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But if any turn away and reject Allah,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Allah will punish him with a mighty Punishment,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: For to Us will be their return;
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Then it will be for Us to call them to account.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: By the Nights twice five;
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the 'Ad (people),-
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Of the (city of) Iram, with lofty pillars,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: The like of which were not produced in (all) the land?
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And with the Thamud (people), who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley?-
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And with Pharaoh, lord of stakes?
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: (All) these transgressed beyond bounds in the lands,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And heaped therein mischief (on mischief).
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Therefore did thy Lord pour on them a scourge of diverse chastisements:
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: For thy Lord is (as a Guardian) on a watch-tower.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Now, as for man, when his Lord trieth him, giving him honour and gifts, then saith he, (puffed up), "My Lord hath honoured me."
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: But when He trieth him, restricting his subsistence for him, then saith he (in despair), "My Lord hath humiliated me!"
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nay, nay! but ye honour not the orphans!
Label: ['syariah']

Text: Nor do ye encourage one another to feed the poor!-
Label: ['syariah']

Text: And ye love wealth with inordinate love!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Nay! When the earth is pounded to powder,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: And thy Lord cometh, and His angels, rank upon rank,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: (To the righteous soul will be said:) "O (thou) soul, in (complete) rest and satisfaction!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "Come back thou to thy Lord,- well pleased (thyself), and well-pleasing unto Him!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "Enter thou, then, among My devotees!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: "Yea, enter thou My Heaven!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: By the Sun and his (glorious) splendour;
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: By the Moon as she follows him;
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: By the Day as it shows up (the Sun's) glory;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Night as it conceals it;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Firmament and its (wonderful) structure;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Earth and its (wide) expanse:
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Soul, and the proportion and order given to it;
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: And its enlightenment as to its wrong and its right;-
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Truly he succeeds that purifies it,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And he fails that corrupts it!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The Thamud (people) rejected (their prophet) through their inordinate wrong-doing,
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Behold, the most wicked man among them was deputed (for impiety).
Label: ['kisah']

Text: But the Messenger of Allah said to them: "It is a She-camel of Allah! And (bar her not from) having her drink!"
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Then they rejected him (as a false prophet), and they hamstrung her. So their Lord, on account of their crime, obliterated their traces and made them equal (in destruction, high and low)!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: By the Night as it conceals (the light);
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Day as it appears in glory;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By (the mystery of) the creation of male and female;-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Verily, (the ends) ye strive for are diverse.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: So he who gives (in charity) and fears (Allah),
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And (in all sincerity) testifies to the best,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Bliss.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: But he who is a greedy miser and thinks himself self-sufficient,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And gives the lie to the best,-
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Misery;
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: Nor will his wealth profit him when he falls headlong (into the Pit).
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: And verily unto Us (belong) the End and the Beginning.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Therefore do I warn you of a Fire blazing fiercely;
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: None shall reach it but those most unfortunate ones
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Who give the lie to Truth and turn their backs.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But those most devoted to Allah shall be removed far from it,-
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Those who spend their wealth for increase in self-purification,
Label: ['syariah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And have in their minds no favour from anyone for which a reward is expected in return,
Label: ['syariah']

Text: But only the desire to seek for the Countenance of their Lord Most High;
Label: ['syariah']

Text: By the Glorious Morning Light,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And by the Night when it is still,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Thy Guardian-Lord hath not forsaken thee, nor is He displeased.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And verily the Hereafter will be better for thee than the present.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And soon will thy Guardian-Lord give thee (that wherewith) thou shalt be well-pleased.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Did He not find thee an orphan and give thee shelter (and care)?
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: And He found thee wandering, and He gave thee guidance.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And He found thee in need, and made thee independent.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Therefore, treat not the orphan with harshness,
Label: ['syariah']

Text: But the bounty of the Lord - rehearse and proclaim!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Have We not expanded thee thy breast?-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And removed from thee thy burden
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: The which did gall thy back?-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And raised high the esteem (in which) thou (art held)?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: So, verily, with every difficulty, there is relief:
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Verily, with every difficulty there is relief.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Therefore, when thou art free (from thine immediate task), still labour hard,
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: And to thy Lord turn (all) thy attention.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: By the Fig and the Olive,
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And the Mount of Sinai,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And this City of security,-
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: We have indeed created man in the best of moulds,
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then do We abase him (to be) the lowest of the low,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Except such as believe and do righteous deeds: For they shall have a reward unfailing.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Then what can, after this, contradict thee, as to the judgment (to come)?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Is not Allah the wisest of judges?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Proclaim! (or read!) in the name of thy Lord and Cherisher, Who created-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Created man, out of a (mere) clot of congealed blood:
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Proclaim! And thy Lord is Most Bountiful,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He Who taught (the use of) the pen,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Taught man that which he knew not.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nay, but man doth transgress all bounds,
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: In that he looketh upon himself as self-sufficient.
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Seest thou one who forbids-
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Seest thou if he is on (the road of) Guidance?-
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Seest thou if he denies (Truth) and turns away?
Label: ['ilmu']

Text: Knoweth he not that Allah doth see?
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Let him beware! If he desist not, We will drag him by the forelock,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: A lying, sinful forelock!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Then, let him call (for help) to his council (of comrades):
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: We will call on the angels of punishment (to deal with him)!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nay, heed him not: But bow down in adoration, and bring thyself the closer (to Allah)!
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: We have indeed revealed this (Message) in the Night of Power:
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Therein come down the angels and the Spirit by Allah's permission, on every errand:
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Peace!... This until the rise of morn!
Label: ['aqidah', 'kisah', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, were not going to depart (from their ways) until there should come to them Clear Evidence,-
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: An messenger from Allah, rehearsing scriptures kept pure and holy:
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Wherein are laws (or decrees) right and straight.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nor did the People of the Book make schisms, until after there came to them Clear Evidence.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And they have been commanded no more than this: To worship Allah, offering Him sincere devotion, being true (in faith); to establish regular prayer; and to practise regular charity; and that is the Religion Right and Straight.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah']

Text: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, will be in Hell-Fire, to dwell therein (for aye). They are the worst of creatures.
Label: ['aqidah', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Those who have faith and do righteous deeds,- they are the best of creatures.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: Their reward is with Allah: Gardens of Eternity, beneath which rivers flow; they will dwell therein for ever; Allah well pleased with them, and they with Him: all this for such as fear their Lord and Cherisher.
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: When the earth is shaken to her (utmost) convulsion,
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And the earth throws up her burdens (from within),
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: And man cries (distressed): 'What is the matter with her?'-
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: On that Day will she declare her tidings:
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: For that thy Lord will have given her inspiration.
Label: ['alam-dunia']

Text: On that Day will men proceed in companies sorted out, to be shown the deeds that they (had done).
Label: ['alam-ghaib']

Text: Then shall anyone who has done an atom's weight of good, see it!
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: And anyone who has done an atom's weight of evil, shall see it.
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-ghaib']

Text: The (Day) of Noise and Clamour:
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: What is the (Day) of Noise and Clamour?
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And what will explain to thee what the (Day) of Noise and Clamour is?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (It is) a Day whereon men will be like moths scattered about,
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And the mountains will be like carded wool.
Label: ['alam-dunia', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: Then, he whose balance (of good deeds) will be (found) heavy,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Will be in a life of good pleasure and satisfaction.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: But he whose balance (of good deeds) will be (found) light,-
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Will have his home in a (bottomless) Pit.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: And what will explain to thee what this is?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (It is) a Fire Blazing fiercely!
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The mutual rivalry for piling up (the good things of this world) diverts you (from the more serious things),
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Until ye visit the graves.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: But nay, ye soon shall know (the reality).
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Again, ye soon shall know!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Nay, were ye to know with certainty of mind, (ye would beware!)
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Again, ye shall see it with certainty of sight!
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then, shall ye be questioned that Day about the joy (ye indulged in!).
Label: ['akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: By (the Token of) Time (through the ages),
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: Verily Man is in loss,
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: Except such as have Faith, and do righteous deeds, and (join together) in the mutual teaching of Truth, and of Patience and Constancy.
Label: ['aqidah', 'syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: Woe to every (kind of) scandal-monger and-backbiter,
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Who pileth up wealth and layeth it by,
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Thinking that his wealth would make him last for ever!
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: By no means! He will be sure to be thrown into That which Breaks to Pieces,
Label: ['akhlak', 'alam-akhirat']

Text: And what will explain to thee That which Breaks to Pieces?
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: (It is) the Fire of (the Wrath of) Allah kindled (to a blaze),
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: The which doth mount (Right) to the Hearts:
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: It shall be made into a vault over them,
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: In columns outstretched.
Label: ['alam-akhirat']

Text: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the Companions of the Elephant?
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Did He not make their treacherous plan go astray?
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: And He sent against them Flights of Birds,
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Striking them with stones of baked clay.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: Then did He make them like an empty field of stalks and straw, (of which the corn) has been eaten up.
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'alam-dunia']

Text: For the covenants (of security and safeguard enjoyed) by the Quraish,
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Their covenants (covering) journeys by winter and summer,-
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Let them adore the Lord of this House,
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Who provides them with food against hunger, and with security against fear (of danger).
Label: ['akhlak', 'kisah']

Text: Seest thou one who denies the Judgment (to come)?
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak', 'ilmu']

Text: Then such is the (man) who repulses the orphan (with harshness),
Label: ['syariah', 'akhlak']

Text: And encourages not the feeding of the indigent.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: So woe to the worshippers
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Who are neglectful of their prayers,
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Those who (want but) to be seen (of men),
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: But refuse (to supply) (even) neighbourly needs.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: To thee have We granted the Fount (of Abundance).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Therefore to thy Lord turn in Prayer and Sacrifice.
Label: ['syariah']

Text: For he who hateth thee, he will be cut off (from Future Hope).
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Say: O ye that reject Faith!
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: I worship not that which ye worship,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And I will not worship that which ye have been wont to worship,
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: To you be your Way, and to me mine.
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: Perish the hands of the Father of Flame! Perish he!
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: No profit to him from all his wealth, and all his gains!
Label: ['ilmu', 'kisah']

Text: Burnt soon will he be in a Fire of Blazing Flame!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: His wife shall carry the (crackling) wood - As fuel!-
Label: ['kisah']

Text: A twisted rope of palm-leaf fibre round her (own) neck!
Label: ['kisah']

Text: Say: He is Allah, the One and Only;
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: Allah, the Eternal, Absolute;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: He begetteth not, nor is He begotten;
Label: ['aqidah']

Text: And there is none like unto Him.
Label: ['aqidah', 'ilmu']

Text: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the Dawn
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: From the mischief of created things;
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: From the mischief of Darkness as it overspreads;
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: From the mischief of those who practise secret arts;
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: And from the mischief of the envious one as he practises envy.
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord and Cherisher of Mankind,
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: The King (or Ruler) of Mankind,
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: The god (or judge) of Mankind,-
Label: ['aqidah', 'akhlak']

Text: From the mischief of the Whisperer (of Evil), who withdraws (after his whisper),-
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: (The same) who whispers into the hearts of Mankind,-
Label: ['akhlak']

Text: Among Jinns and among men.
Label: ['akhlak']
